Ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este crédito con la esperanza D. mejorar sus condiciones D. vida y las D. su familia. Con el préstamo pretenD. invertir en su negocio para abastecerlo D. una mejor gama D. productos tales como: cereales, bebidas, huevos, leche, café, verduras, frutas, azúcar, sal, y D. más productos atractivos para una tienda. Con la fe puesta en Dios que sus ingresos se verán aumentados y esto le permitirá obtener mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Hilda Cristina V. D. J., age 50, lives in her own home with her life partner and her child, who is in school. Hilda has a store in which she offers different products such as: disposable paper, fruits, drinks, candies, cookies, and coffee, among other basic staples. On top of these products she also sells frozen and liquid popsicles that she prepares from fresh fruit in her own home in the Armenia municipality in the Sonsonate Department. She dreams of expanding her business in order to give her customers a greater variety of products. She has decided to request this loan with the hope of improving her living conditions and those of her family. With this loan, she plans to invest in her business in order to stock it with a better range of products, such as: cereal, drinks,  eggs, milk, coffee, vegetables, fruits, sugar, salt, and more good products for her store. She has faith in God that her income will increase and this will allow her to have a greater quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase: sweet drinks, candies, cookies, coffee, popsicles and more fruit to prepare fruit drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, beans, rice, spices, cookies, condiments and coffee, among others.

loans.name: Chepkoech

texts.en:
Chepkoech is married with one child aged four years, she herself being 28. She has been in dairy farming for seven years  in the Litein area of South Rift, Kenya, producing milk and selling to Brookside Dairies.She specializes in dairy farming but gets additional income from tea as well.

Chepkoech has requested a loan of 50,000 KES to help her put up a zero-grazing unit for her dairy cows. She says she expects her production to improve and make her a major supplier of milk in her area. She believes her dairy produce will be adequate to provide the basic requirements such as education of the children when that time comes.

Chepkoech says their major challenge is scarcity of land to hold a good number of dairy cows. She is glad that farmers can access agricultural loans through Juhudi Kilimo's help

loans.use: To construct a zero-grazing unit.

loans.name: Inkezo Group

texts.en:
Doris is 44 years old and married with five children, between the ages of 14 and 24; three of them attend school. She runs a retail business in Kwa Zulu Natal of Empangeni, South Africa. In the photo she is in green, raising her hand.

She’s been in her business for five years and sells Avon products and cleaning materials door-to-door. She requested this loan through WDB and Kiva to buy cleaning materials. She says that the main challenges to her business are customers who take her products on credit and fail to pay on time.  She says that the extra income from this loan will help her have a proper shelter. In future she sees herself  having an office at the mall to sell her Avon products and as having employees.

She adds that WDB has helped her so much with the loans and she now sees a future in her life.

loans.use: To buy cleaning materials for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
This Kiva borrower is a 46-year-old married man and the father of three children who are still attending school. He has been working as a mechanic for 18 years, and in 2000 he established his own car repair shop. He fixes specific types of vehicles.  He used to work in the Lebanese army, but because of health problems he had to retire. This man represents the only income source of the family. 

He has taken out three Kiva loans and has been a trusty client, repaying on time. Today he is requesting to borrow $ 2000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy new mechanicA. materials and supplies in order to develop his workshop and attract more customers. He hopes that the coming years will continue to bring positive growth and increased income.

loans.use: to buy new mechanical materials and supplies.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana Gloria H. D. L. C. D. 38 años D. edad, habita en casa alquilada con su compañero D. vida. Se dedica a L. venta D. productos esotéricos (velas D.  colores, velas aromáticas, porta velas, inciensos, aromas, diversos productos naturales para L. salud). Gracias a su empeño y largo trabajo, ha logrado establecer dos puestos D. este tipo D. productos en el mercado D.  Cojutepeque del Departamento D. Cuscatlán, lugar muy concurrido por personas transeúntes, en especial los puestos D. Doña Ana que cada día los atienD. desD. muy temprano  con  una sonrisa, mucho entusiasmo  y sobre todo con mucha confianza en Dios que sus esfuerzos valdrán L. pena y algún día logrará mejorar sus condiciones D. vida y las D. su familia.  Gracias a su amabilidad con L. que realiza su trabajo las personas D. L. zona cada día L. prefieren más y elL. ha notado que sus productos se venden con facilidad. Solicita este crédito para seguir abasteciendo su negocio y poder ofrecer a los clientes una mayor variedad D. productos para que estos sigan siendo buscados como hasta ahora. Con el crédito pretenD. comprar mayor cantidad y variedad D. velas, inciensos, productos naturales para L. salud, diferentes aromas, entre otros. D. esta manera espera obtener mayores ingresos para el sostenimiento D. su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Gloria H. D. L. C., 38, lives in a rented house with her life partner.  She sells esoteric items (colored candles, scented candles, candle holders, incense, scents and various natural health products).  Thanks to her dedication and long work she’s managed to establish two stands of this type of product in the Cojutepeque market, Cuscatlán Department, a place with lots of foot traffic, especially at Ana’s stands which she opens very early with a smile and lots of enthusiasm but, above all, with trust in God that her efforts will be worth it and some day she will manage to improve her and her family’s living conditions.  Thanks to the kindness with which she does her work, people in the area prefer her each day and she’s noted that her products sell with ease.

She is requesting this loan to continue stocking her business to offer her customers a larger variety of products so that  they will continue to seek her out as they’ve done to date.  She will use the loan to buy a larger amount and variety of candles, incense and natural health products, various scents, among others.  She hopes thus to obtain higher income for her family’s support.

loans.use: to buy candles in assorted colors, scents, candle holders, incense, and various natural health products.

location.town: Cojutepeque en el departamento de Cuscatlán

loans.name: Jeanette

texts.es: La señora Jeannette se dedica a la venta de ropa y su esposo trabaja en un laboratorio farmacéutico,  así consiguen los ingresos que tiene para mantener  a su familia. El crédito lo necesita para la compra de chamarras, deportivos, poleras para caballero, para su tienda de ventas de dichos productos. Es casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en casa propia con su madre  ubicada en la zona de las San Martin de la ciudad de La Paz. Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO.
texts.en:
Jeannette sells clothes and her husband works in a pharmaceutical laboratory.  This is how they earn income to support their families.  

She needs the loan to buy jackets, sportswear and men’s t-shirts for her store that sells such products.

She’s married and has two children and lives in her own house with her mother located in La Paz’s San Martin zone.  This is her first time working with IMPRO.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Yhonni

texts.es: El señor Yhonni trabaja con su movilidad, es taxista independiente y esta actividad es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantener  a su familia. El crédito lo necesita para la compra de llantas nuevas para su movilidad. Es casado tiene un hijo y vive en alquiler ubicada en la zona de las San Martín de la ciudad de La Paz. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron ya que pudo mejorar la calidad e vida de su familia. Ya obtuvo un crédito anterior a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Yhonni is an independent taxi driver; he uses his own car.  This activity is his source of income to support his family.  He needs the loan to buy new tires for his car.  He’s married and has a son.  He lives in a rented unit located in La Paz’s San Martin zone.  He is very satisfied with the loans he’s been granted in that they allowed him to improve his family’s quality of life.  He has had a previous Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy tires for his taxi.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is 38 years old and married with four children.  She sells vegetables so as to earn a living.  She has been running the business for seven years.  She has managed to sustain her business for these years because she has been trained in business management through the training sessions offered by Faulu Kenya.  Besides food, she sells clothes.  She hopes to expand her business into wholesale within five years.  She has requested 40,000 Kes to buy vegetables, tomatoes and Irish potatoes.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, tomatoes and Irish potatoes.

loans.name: Benrogers

texts.en: Benrogers is 35 years old and married with two children.  He runs a retail shop so as to earn a living.  In addition, he is a water vendor.  Over the six years he has been running his business, he has witnessed an upward growth since he joined Faulu Kenya.  He hopes to expand his business into wholesale in the future.  He has requested 40,000 Kes to buy sugar, salt, maize flour, and sodas.

loans.use: To buy sugar, salt, maize flour, and sodas.

loans.name: María Raquel

texts.es: María Raquel M. M. de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus  dos pequeños hijos, que por el momento se encuentran estudiando. El sueño de  María es ver a sus hijos convertidos en grandes profesionales,  esto es lo que impulsa a esta mujer a trabajar y luchar día a día ya que sabe que solo de esta manera podrá dar  a sus hijos lo que necesitan. Ella posee una pequeña granja de pollos y gallinas en su casa de habitación ubicada en El Cantón Los Sitios del Municipio de Talnique,  Departamento de La Libertad, lo que hace ella es comprar el pollo o gallina a partir de dos días de nacidos y crecerlos con el debido cuidado que amerita este tipo de animales hasta alcanzar las 6 semanas de vida, fecha a partir de la que los pollos logran pesar 5 libras o más y están listos para su reventa. Últimamente la demanda de sus hermosos pollos y gallinas a aumentado por parte de los clientes de los alrededores del lugar que ya posee y muchas veces no puede satisfacerles a todos. Es por esta razón que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL  para invertir en su negocio y comprar mayor cantidad de pollos y gallinas, así como los materiales necesarios para el mantenimiento de los mismos tales como: Concentrado de crecimiento y engorde, y vacunas para prevenir cualquier enfermedad. Con la fe puesta en Dios que de esta forma su situación va a mejorar y podrá dar a sus hijos una mejor vida.
texts.en:
María Raquel M. M., 30, lives in her own house with her life partner and their two small children who are currently in school.  María’s dream is to see her children become great professionals.  This is what pushes her to work and struggle daily because she knows that this is the only way she’ll be able to give her children all they need.

She has a small poultry farm at home located in Los Sitios canton in Talnique municipality in La Libertad Department.  What she does is buy the chicks or chickens two days from hatching and raises them with the necessary care this type of animal requires.  When they reach the age of 6 weeks and they weigh about five pounds or more they are ready for sale.  

Local customer demand for her beautiful chickens has increased lately and sometimes she can’t meet all the demand.  Because of this she’s decided to ask INTEGERAL for a loan to invest in her business and buy a larger number of chicks and chickens as well as supplies needed to maintain them such as: concentrated feed and vaccines to prevent illness.  She has faith in God that these measures will improve her situation and she’ll be able to provide her children with a better life.

loans.use: to buy chicks and chickens to raise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more potatoes, tomatoes, cabbages and bananas to sell

loans.name: Agoba Obwavu Women's Group

texts.en:
32-year-old Hajara N. is a happily married mother of four. She has been a member of Agoba Obwavu Women's Group, Lugazi for seven years now. All this while she has been in charge of a poultry sales business in Nkonkonjeru, which she says she began after she gave up her agricultural business. Hajara says one of her closest friends inspired her to begin this business. Hajara also has a small hotel business.

Hajara says she is going to use this loan to purchase more chickens to resell.

loans.use: The purchase of more poultry to resell

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: La señora Miriam tiene un puesto de venta de maní azucarada que es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantener  a su familia. El crédito lo requiere para comprar en mayor cantidad maní y azúcar, para ahorrar en costos y tratar de mejorar sus ingresos. Es casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en alquiler en la zona de las Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz. Miriam es cliente antigua de IMPRO y esta es la tercera vez que solicita un crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Miriam has a stand where she sells sugared peanuts.  This is her source of income with which she supports her family.  She requires this loan to buy a larger quantity of peanuts and sugar so that she can save on costs and try to improve her profits.  Miriam is married, has two children, and lives in a rental house in Las Pasankeri neighborhood, in the city of La Paz.  Miriam is a long-standing client of IMPRO and this is the third time that she has requested a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy peanuts and sugar for her sugared peanut business

loans.name: Roger

texts.es: El señor Roger se dedica a la colocación de aretes (piercing), el crédito lo requiere para la compra de guantes, aretes, tijeras, pinzas, gasas, etc., pues esta actividad es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantenerse y ayudar a su madre. Es soltero,  vive en casa de su mare  ubicada en la zona de las Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz.
texts.en: Sr. Roger operates an ear-piercing service.  The loan he is requesting will be used to buy gloves, earrings, scissors, tweezers, gauze, and other supplies.  This business is the only source of income that he has to support himself and help his mother.  Roger is single and lives at his mother’s house in the District of Sopocachi in the city of La Paz.

loans.use: To purchase gloves, earrings, scissors, tweezers, gauze, and other supplies.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James N. K. is 53 years old, married to Nancy, and has four children who are all adults. He has been operating rental houses in Mwiki town for ten years, with a monthly income of 22,000 KES.

He has applied for a second loan from KADET LTD after paying off the previous loan well and good time. He intends to use the loan to renovate and paint his rental houses. With the anticipated profits he plans to pay school fees for his one child who is in Kenyatta University.

In the future he desires to build more rental houses.

loans.use: To renovate and paint his rental houses

loans.name: Betty

texts.es: La señora Betty tiene una ferretería, que es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantener  a su familia. El crédito lo requiere para comprar tornillos, lijas, cables, clavos, etc. Betty se enfermo y tuvo un gasto en los medicamentos y su hospitalización, habiendo usado sus ahorros para este gasto imprevisto. Es casada, tiene un hijo y vive en casa de sus suegros ubicada en la zona de las Obispo Bosque de la ciudad de La Paz.
texts.en:
Sra. Betty owns a hardware store, which serves as a source of income needed to support her family. This loan will be used to buy screws, sandpaper, cables, nails, and other products. Betty became ill and accumulated expenses for medicines and her hospitalization. She utilized her savings in order to cover these unexpected expenses.

Betty is married and has one child. She lives in the home of her in-laws, which is located in the District of Obispo Bosque in the city of La Paz.

loans.use: To purchase screws, sandpaper, cables, nails, and other products.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther W. M. is a 29-year-old businesswoman. She operates a salon so as to earn a living. She has been in the business for eight years and has employed one person. She also sells secondhand clothes for extra income.

Since Esther joined Faulu Kenya, a partner of Kiva, she has been able to boost her business with her previous loans. She has requested 20,000 KES to add to her stock of clothes and buy hair weaves, chemicals, combs and a hair drier.

loans.use: To add to her stock of clothes and buy hair weaves, chemicals, combs and a hair drier

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El señor José Luís es instructor de gimnasio y arbitro de fútbol; el crédito lo requiere para la compra de un equipo de sonido para clases de aerobics en el gimnasio y para clases particulares. Con las actividades que realiza cubre los gastos que tiene. Vive en casa en alquiler ubicada en la zona Buenos Aires de la ciudad De La Paz, es soltero y tiene un hijo. Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en: Sr. José Luís is a fitness instructor and soccer referee.  The loan he is requesting will be used to buy sound equipment for his aerobics classes held at the gym and for private lessons.  These activities enable him to cover his expenses.  José Luís lives in a rented house located in the District of Buenos Aires in the city of La Paz.  He is single and has one child.  This is the first time he has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase sound equipment for his aerobics classes.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy W. G. is 34 years old and married. She has been selling clothes for three years and has employed one person in her business. For extra income, Mercy also has a transport business. She was previously selling spirits and wines to earn a living.

When Mercy joined Faulu Kenya, she decided to open a saving account. This has helped her to manage her finances. Mercy has requested 20,000 KES to add to her stock of clothes.

loans.use: To add to her stock of clothes

loans.name: Magali

texts.es: La señora Magali trabaja como empleada domestica en la zona sur de la ciudad pero también ella lava ropa particularmente, su esposo es albañil, con los ingresos que obtienen se mantienen. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de cepillos para lavado de ropa, detergentes y lavandinas. Vive en alquiler ubicada en la zona de Bajo Llojeta de la ciudad de La Paz, es casada y tiene cinco hijos. Es la primera vez  que Magali trabaja con Impro.
texts.en:
Sra. Magali works as a domestic employee in the southern part of the city, but she also has a separate business providing laundry services. Her husband works as a mason. Magali and her husband are able to support themselves with their incomes.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy brushes for scrubbing clothes, detergents, and bleaches. She lives in a rental property located in the District of Bajo Llojeta in the city of La Paz. Magali is married and has five children. This is the first time she has worked with IMPRO.

loans.use: To purchase brushes for scrubbing clothes, detergents, and bleaches.

loans.name: Fermin Antonio

texts.es: Fermín Antonio tiene 50 años vive con su esposa, tienen dos hijos que son mayores de edad. Desde muy joven empezó a trabajar como es la venta de ladrillos,  le gusta mucho su trabajo, con el paso del tiempo ha podido ampliar su clientela  que le solicitan diferentes productos, en sus metas para el futuro tiene planeado comprar un medio de transporte para llevar las mercancías que le solicitan. Fermín tiene pensado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de arena, herramientas, leña, entre otros productos de esta manera espera salir adelante.
texts.en:
Fermín Antonio is 50 years old, lives with his wife, and has two adult children. At a very young age, he started working by selling bricks. He enjoys his work very much. As time passed, Fermín expanded his customer base who now request different products. His goals for the future include buying a vehicle for transporting the bricks that have been ordered.

Fermín plans to invest the loan he requested in the purchase of sand, equipment, firewood, and other items in hopes of getting ahead.

loans.use: To purchase sand, equipment, firewood, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase large quantities of cheese, curds, butter, and cream.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 27 years old.  He started running his mobile-phone money transfer business two years ago.  He has been able to sustain his business because of his hard work.  He has also set up some space for photocopy services in the same business premises.  Joseph also does farming for extra income.  He hopes to open other outlets of his business in the future.  He has requested 20,000 Kes to add E-float to his business.

loans.use: To add E-float to his mobile-phone money transfer business.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: La señora Rosario se dedica a la venta de antenas parabólicas ofreciéndolas casa por casa; esta actividad es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para cubrir sus gastos. El crédito lo requiere para la ampliación de un anticrético ( anticrético es una figura legal por la cual el dueño de casa y el inquilino acuerdan que el inquilino vivirá en la casa por un tiempo determinado al termino del cual el dueño de casa devolverá el dinero recibido al comienzo del contrato). Rosario vive en alquiler ubicada en la zona de Agua de la Vida de la ciudad de La Paz; es soltera y no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosario is a sales representative who sells satellite dishes door-to-door. This job proves a source of income by which she is able to cover her expenses. This loan will be used to extend her “anticrético” contract (an “anticrético” is a legal agreement in which the landlord and tenant agree that the tenant will live in the house for a specified time, after which the landlord will return the money that was received at the start of the contract).

Rosario lives in a rental property in the District of Agua de La Vida in the city of La Paz. She is single and has no children. This is the first time she has received a loan from IMPRO.

loans.use: To extend her "anticrético" rental contract.

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es: Clotilde de 30 años, natural del distrito de Santa Rosa, es una mujer muy  trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Teodoro de 34 años y sus 03 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Junto a su esposo Clotilde trabaja todos los días en sus tierras, que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado que sus tierras sean muy productivas y siembra de todo un poco, ya que sabe que todo producto que obtenga será de calidad. Ella principalmente siembra cacao, café, palillo y hojas de  coca, productos que tienen mucha demanda en el mercado. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembríos de la plaga de insectos que pueden afectar sus plantaciones, ya que en otras ocasiones no lograba cosechar suficiente y sus ganancias eran menos. Lleva 12 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus cultivos, hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, pues es ahí donde vende sus productos. Para el futuro de su negocio, espera juntar el dinero necesario para comprar nuevas tierras. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, siente que este crédito le ayudará mucho en el desarrollo de su actividad. En su banco comunal es una socia, muy responsable, de lo cual se siente muy orgullosa. Comprará con el crédito solicitado, trampas, e insecticidas para combatir  los insectos quienes para combatir la plaga de insectos que afectan sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Clotilde is 30 years old and a native of the District of Santa Rosa.  She is an extremely hardworking woman who lives in her own home with her husband Teodoro, age 34, and their three beloved children for whom she wants to provide a better life.  Clotilde and her husband work together every day on their land.  Through much effort, they have been able to make their land productive so that they can grow a little bit of everything.  They know that whatever they produce will be of quality.  Clotilde grows primarily cacao, coffee, turmeric, and coca leaves.  These products are in great demand at the market.  What she enjoys most about her work is protecting her crops from plagues of insects that could negatively impact them.  On some occasions, she is not able to achieve a sufficient harvest and thereby earns less income.  Clotilde has been farming for twelve years and considers the most difficult part to be transporting her crops to the city of San Francisco to be sold.  In the future, she hopes to save the necessary funds to buy additional farmland.

This is the fifth loan Clotilde has received from MFP.  She feels that this loan will be a great help in developing her business.  Clotilde is known in her Communal Bank for being a very responsible member, a distinction of which she is proud.  The loan she requested will be used to buy traps and insecticides for combating pests that are attacking her crops.

loans.use: To purchase traps and insecticides for combating pests.

loans.name: Apec Al Ouma Ngor Groupe 2

texts.fr:
Apec Al Ouma groupe 2 regroupe 12 femmes qui vivent toutes dans la localité de Ngor, un village environnant qui se situe entre Ouakam et Yoff. Elles évoluent toutes dans le domaine du commerce et elles ont des activités séparées de vente de produits divers tels que denrées alimentaires, produits locaux, tissus, habits, friperie, produits de beauté et petite restauration. Elles  sont représentées par madame Khardiata S.. Elle voyage fréquemment pour aller a Diaobe un marché hebdomadaire ou elle se procure des produits locaux comme la pâte de d’arachide, les poissons séchés, etc. Elle vend aussi des produits cosmétiques. Elle a choisi son activité de commerce par nécessité pour  subvenir aux besoins de sa famille. Elle a une expérience d’une dizaine d’années environ dans son activité. Son objectif est de lutter contre le chômage     et  la pauvreté. Le sous groupe est membre du guichet de Ouakam depuis février 2011. Il sollicite un crédit de 2 075 000 dans le but de se procurer des produits à vendre pour chaque membre. Elles souhaitent renforcer leurs fonds de commerce, élargir et diversifier leurs activités respectives et faire face à la demande croissante de leurs clients.

Al Ouma is a Senegalese nonprofit whose full name is The Association for Koranic Education and Teaching. 
 
Originally founded to work with at-risk children, especially talibés (young boys from poor families who beg in Senegalese metropolitan areas), Al Ouma has evolved its mission to work with adults as well as children. They currently have over 10,000 members, and are actively engaged in supporting the economic development of their members in the hopes of improving their quality of life, and that of their at-risk children.
 
Al Ouma's members are currently organized into smaller associations which meet each week to contribute to a group fund that helps finance small loans for members.  Members typically put in $2 USD per week. Because UIMCEC and Al Ouma both share the mission of fighting poverty through economic empowerment, they have formed a partnership to provide loans to Al Ouma associations at a lower interest rate than UIMCEC usually offers its clients.
texts.en:
Apec Al Ouma group 2 unites 12 women who all live in Ngor, a neighboring village which is situated between Ouakam et Yoff. They are all working in commerce and they have separate activities selling various products such as foodstuffs, local products, cloth, clothes, used clothing, cosmetics and cooked foods. 

They are represented by Mrs. Khardiata S.. She frequently travels to Diaobe, a weekly market, where she buys local products such as peanut butter, dried fish, etc. She also sells cosmetics. She chose to do business as a matter of necessity, to support her family. She has been in this business for some 10 years. Her goal is to fight joblessness and poverty. 

This sub-group has been a member of the Ouakam office since February 2011. It is requesting a loan of 2,075,000 francs so each member can buy merchandise to resell. The members wish to bolster their working capital, expand and diversify their respective activities, and meet the growing demand of their customers.  

Al Ouma is a Senegalese nonprofit whose full name is The Association for Koranic Education and Teaching. 
 
Originally founded to work with at-risk children, especially talibés (young boys from poor families who beg in Senegalese metropolitan areas), Al Ouma has evolved its mission to work with adults as well as children. They currently have over 10,000 members, and are actively engaged in supporting the economic development of their members in the hopes of improving their quality of life, and that of their at-risk children.
 
Al Ouma's members are currently organized into smaller associations which meet each week to contribute to a group fund that helps finance small loans for members.  Members typically put in 2 USD per week. Because UIMCEC and Al Ouma both share the mission of fighting poverty through economic empowerment, they have formed a partnership to provide loans to Al Ouma associations at a lower interest rate than UIMCEC usually offers its clients.

loans.use: to buy local products and cosmetics, etc. for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fabric and shoes.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.es: La Sra. Lorena Vive en la localidad de el torno es nacida en el departamento de Santa Cruz, es de ocupación comerciante de productos de belleza cosmeticos y también trabaja como secretaria en el colegio de la localidad del mismo municipio, su esposo es empleado en una empresa, tienen un hijo, pequeño el destino del crédito es para la compra de material de construcción,  para la  construcción de un kiosco, en su domicilio, son clientes antiguos en la institución, por lo que se sienten agradecidos por el apoyo que se le a brindado. La Sra. Lorena es una pesona responsable y trabajadora siempre pensando en el bienestar de su familia, con muchas ganas de superacion con el deseo de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Lorena lives in the town of El Torno, but she was born in the Department of Santa Cruz. Her occupation is that of a merchant who sells beauty products and cosmetics. She also works as a secretary for a local school in the same town where she lives. Her husband is a company employee and they have a young child.

This loan will be used to buy construction materials for building a kiosk in her home. Lorena and her husband are long-time clients of Emprender and express their appreciation for the support that has been given to them. Sra. Lorena is a responsible and hardworking individual who is always thinking about the welfare of her family. With great desire to succeed, she wants to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials for building a sales kiosk.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: El Señor Rubén es abogado y trabaja independientemente realizando todo tipo de tramites y casos legales; el crédito lo necesita para la compra de una computadora la misma le ayudara a que su trabajo lo realice con mayor rapidez. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz,  es soltero y no tiene hijos. Los anteriores créditos el cliente utilizo para la educación.
texts.en: Sr. Rubén is a lawyer and works independently on all types of paperwork and legal cases.  He needs a loan to purchase a computer that will help him perform his job faster.  Rubén lives at his parents’ house located in the District of San Pedro in the city of La Paz.  He is single and has no children.  His previous loans were used for education.

loans.use: To purchase a computer.

loans.name: Djromahuton12 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DJROMAHUTON12 est formé de sept personnes qui habitent toutes dans le même quartier à Porto-Novo (capitale administrative du Bénin). La représentante de ce groupe, nommée josephine, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. josephine est mariée à un pêcheur du nom de David. Le couple a six enfants, tous scolarisés, dont trois sont à leur charge. josephine habite le quartier Houinta à Porto-Novo depuis sa naissance, où elle vit avec sa famille. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Il y a une dizaine d'année que josephine mène comme activité la vente d'"akassa" (aliment local fait à base d'amidon de maïs)à son domicile. De façon secondaire, josephine vend des crabes qu'elle achète au marché de Ouando à Porto-Novo. josephine a déjà obtenu une fois de crédit auprès de ALIDé et a bien effectué le remboursement. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, josephine désire obtenir un autre financement. Plus tard, josephine ambitionne acquérir une parcelle et y intégrer avec ses enfants.
texts.en:
The DJROMAHUTON12 group consists of seven people who all live in the same neighborhood in Porto-Novo (administrative capital of Benin). The group’s representative is Josephine, seen in the photo with her hand raised. Josephine is married to David, a fisherman. The couple has six children, three of them still in their care. All have attended school. Josephine has lived in the district of Houinta, in Porto-Novo, all of her life, and this is where the family now resides. The couple handle together the various family responsibilities. 

For the past 10 years or so, Josephine has been selling "akassa" (a local food made from corn starch) from her home. She also sells crabs that she buys at the Ouando market in Porto-Novo. 

Josephine has previously obtained one loan from ALIDé, and has repaid it in full. In order to strengthen her business and better meet customer demand, she is seeking another loan. She hopes someday to buy a plot of land to live there with her children.

loans.use: to buy bags of corn and baskets of crab

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: Elsa, de 27 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Félix de 30 años y sus 02 queridos hijos Juan de 10 años y María 04 años de edad, quienes son el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Los verdes campos del poblado de Santa Rosa, ubicado en la selva tropical Ayacuchana, han sido en la vida de Elsa un lugar muy agradable para trabajar, desde muy pequeña sus padres le enseñaron esta labor y ahora ella tiene sus propias tierras en las que trabaja junto a su pareja con mucho esmero y sacrificio, sembrando plantas de café, cacao, achiote y hojas de coca. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras, ya que así siente que su arduo trabajo tuvo sus frutos, lleva 08 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus cultivos hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, que es el lugar donde los vende. Elsa solicita el préstamo para realizar unos de sus planes, incrementar sus sembríos con plantas de cacao ya que es una de las plantas con mayor mercado en el mundo. Con el tiempo, espera juntar el dinero suficiente para comprar nuevas tierras. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene la responsabilidad de pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente y está dispuesta a hacerlo. Dentro su banco comunal siempre está al tanto de todos los acuerdos a los que llegan. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará semillas de cacao y así aumentar su producción.
texts.en: Elsa, 27 years old, is a happy and hard working woman. She lives in her own house with her partner Felix who is 30 years old and their two dear children, Juan and Maria, 10 and 4 years old, who are the reason for all of their efforts. The green fields of the villiage of Santa Rosa, located in the tropical jungle of Ayacuchana, have been for Elsa a very pleasant place to work. Since she was very young her parents have taught her this work and now she has her own land which she works with Felix, planting coffee, cacoa, achiote and coca leaves with great dedication and sacrifice.  What she likes best about her work is harvesting her lands and the feeling that her hard work has paid off. Elsa has eight years working in this way and she considers the most difficult part to be transporting their crops to the city of San Francisco where the crops are sold. Elsa is requesting this loan to carry out her plan of increased planting of cacao plants since it is one of the plants with the largest market in the world. With time, she hopes to put together sufficient funds to buy new land. This is her fifth credit with MFP, she knows that she has the responsibility to pay all of the payments on time and is ready to do it. Within her communal bank she is always aware of all the agreements that they reach. With the loan she will buy cacao seeds and will increase cacao production.

loans.use: To buy cocoa seeds

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es:
la sra. Ana Julia L. tiene 51 años de edad, vive en Ojo de Agua El Paraiso y se dedica a la venta de granos basicos como ser maíz y frijoles, dicha actividad la realiza en su casa de habitación y tiene mas de 3 años de realizarla, durante todo este tiempo ha logrado adquirir amplia experiencia en la administración de su negocio, de esto ha vivido en los últimos tres años y sus condiciones de vida han mejorado.
Doña Ana abastece a una gran cantidad de personas del lugar en donde vive, Ana al momento de comprar los granos basicos siempre escoge lo mejor y es por esto que tiene  muchos clientes, el producto que vende es de muy buena calidad.
Doña Ana esta casada y con su esposo lograron procrear 3 hijos, los que en la actualidad son totalmente independientes.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de frijoles y maiz en granos.
texts.en:
Ms. Ana Julia L. is 51 years old and lives in Ojo de Agua, El Paraiso and works selling basic grains like corn and beans. She has been doing this from her house for over three years, during which time she has gained a great amount of experience administering her business, which has allowed her to make a living in the last three years and improve her quality of life.

Ana is able to serve a lot of customers. When she is buying her basic grains, she always chooses the best quality, which is why she has so many clients. 

Ana is married and has 3 children with her husband, all of which are currently totally independent. She will use the loan to buy beans and corn.

loans.use: to buy beans and corn.

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is 53 years old, married and with six school-going children.  To support his family, he runs a taxi business and a retail shop.  He has been in the business for seven years.  He has employed two people to assist him in the business.  

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has learnt how to save his money.  This has helped him to manage his business finances.  He has requested 10,000 Kes to buy maize flour, salt, vegetables and soap for resale.

loans.use: To buy maize flour, salt, vegetables and soap for resale.

loans.name: Ever

texts.es: Ever, de 26 años, es un joven muy alegre y luchador, vive en su propia casa  junto a su esposa Marilyn de 25 años y sus 02 queridos hijos Edson 06 y Erick de 02 años de edad, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Ever, es un hombre que se dedica con mucho esmero a la labor agraria, él se encarga de labrar la tierra, es campesino y cuenta con 03 hectáreas de terreno; donde cultiva café, plátano y hojas de coca; que son plantas nativas de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Viene trabajando 09 años en sus propias tierras;  en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros; de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos y los comercializa a las empresas acopiadoras, quienes le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo de cada producto que vende. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio situado en la ciudad de San Francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus granos de cacao, café y hojas de coca. Ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar su producción, para  así darle una buena estabilidad económica a su  familia.Este es su cuarto crédito con MFP está dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy participe. Con el crédito solicitado contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen en el desmonte de malezas que perjudican sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
26 year-old Ever is a very cheerful and hard-working young man.  He lives in his own home together with his wife, 25 year-old Marilyn, and his two beloved children, 6 year-old Edson and 2 year-old Erick, who he would like to provide with a better quality of life.

Ever is a man who puts a lot of care into farming his land.  He is a farmer and has 3 hectares of land where he grows coffee, bananas and coca leaf.  These plants are all native to the rainforest area of the Apurimac River Valley.  Ever has been working his own land for nine years.  At harvest time he has the support of day laborers who help him to harvest his fruit quickly.  He sells his produce to wholesale companies who pay him very well for each kilogram of produce.

Ever considers the most difficult part of his work to be transporting his produce from his farm to the warehouse centers which are located in the city of San Francisco.  This is where they offer him the best prices for his cacao and coffee beans, and his coca leaf.  Currently, Ever's main priority is buying new land so that he can increase his production and provide his family with good financial stability.

This is Ever's fourth loan from MFP and he is prepared to make all of his loan repayments on time since he would like to access another loan in the future.  Ever takes an active part in his community bank.  He will use the loan that he has requested to hire day laborers who will support him in getting rid of the weeds that damage his plantations.

loans.use: to hire day laborers to help him weed his plantations

loans.name: Nuvia Liceth

texts.es:
la sra. Nuvia Liceth M. P. tiene 35 años de edad, vive  en Ojo de Agua el Paraiso y se dedica a la venta de granos basicos como ser arroz, frijoles y maiz, tiene mucha experiencia en la venta de su producto  y en la administración de su negocio,
Doña Nubia abástese de estos granos a varios comedores de esa zona, su esposo les entrega el producto en sus negocios y esto hace que varias personas la prefieran ya que no tienen que movilizarse a comprar dicho producto.
Doña Nubia de su esposo recibe mucho apoyo en su negocio, juntos trabajan duro para salir adelante.
Nubia en la actualidad esta a cargo de su madre, como toda buena hija se ha tomado esa responsabilidad.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de arroz, frijoles y maiz.
texts.en:
Nuvia Liceth M. P. is 35 years old and lives in Ojo de Agua, El Paraíso.  Her business is selling basic grains such as rice, beans and corn.  She has a lot of experience selling her products and managing her business. 

Nubia supplies a number of eateries in the area with her produce.  Her husband makes deliveries to the businesses and some customers prefer buying from them because it means they don't have to travel to buy their produce.  Nubia receives a lot of support from her husband.  She and her husband work hard together in order to get ahead in life.

Nubia currently looks after her mother.  Like all good daughters, she has taken on this responsibility.  She will use her loan to buy rice, beans and corn.

loans.use: to buy basic grains: rice, beans and corn

loans.name: Haydee Suyapa

texts.es:
la sra. Haydee Suyapa C. M. tiene 42 años de edad, vive en barrio el centro de Ojo de Agua El Paraiso y se dedica  a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pequeña pulperia en su casa de habitacion la cual opera bajo el nombre de Pulperia PAOLA.
Doña Haydee cuenta con una buena clientela en su negocio ya que trata a sus clientes con amabilidad y los precios son un poco mas bajos que en los otros negocios.
Cabe mencionar que doña Haydee tiene una buena administración de su negocio, ya que de esto a vivido los últimos años.
Doña Haydee esta casada y a dado a luz a dos hermosas niñas, las que en la actualidad están cursando sus estudios primarios, sus hijas son lo que la animan a seguir adelante para poder brindarles un buen futuro.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia al por mayor para surtir mas su negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Haydee Suyapa Morazán, 42, lives in the Centro de Ojo de Agua neighborhood in El Paraíso.  She sells daily consumption items in a small grocery store she has installed in her home that’s called “Pulpería PAOLA.”

Haydee has a good clientele in her store because she treats her customers kindly and prices are a bit lower than in other stores.  It’s worth mentioning that Haydee runs her store well and has supported herself this way the last few years.

Haydee is married and has given birth to two beautiful daughters who are currently going to elementary school.  Her daughters motivate her to continue forward in order to give them a good future.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise at wholesale to better stock her store.

loans.use: to buy milk, beans, coffee, bread, cookies, lard, sugar, rice, margarine, cereal, snacks, tomato sauce, eggs, wheat and corn flour, condiments, salt, candles, batteries, matches, juices, powdered soft drinks and soups.

loans.name: Elvira Francisca

texts.es: Elvira es una madre de familia de 39 años, tiene 2 hijos de los cuales ambos están a su cargo. Desde hace 16 años que tiene este negocio como es la venta de destace de res, la ubicación de su negocio es en la terminal de buses, en donde transitan varios clientes de Elvira buscando una gran variedad de carnes. Ella tiene varios financiamientos y todos han sido destinados para mejorar su negocio. Actualmente ella solicita este financiamiento para capital de trabajo que será destinado para la compra de hueso, ubre, carne molida, lomo, entre otros tipos de carnes. Su deseo es mantener esta actividad económica ya que en estos tiempos es muy difícil porque hay mucha competencia.
texts.en:
Elvira, 39, is a single mother; she has two children in her care.  For 16 years she has been a beef butcher.  Her business is located in the bus terminal where several of her customers pass through looking for a large variety of meats.  She’s had several loans that were all used to improve her business.  

She is asking for this working capital loan to buy bones, utter, ground meat and loin, among other cuts of meat.  Her wish is to stay in business since these days it’s very difficult because there is a lot of competition.

loans.use: to buy bones, utter, ground meat and loin, among other cuts of meat.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia tiene 46 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Ernesto de 49 años y sus 04 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar un mejor por venir. Los campos que posee Lidia son las mejores y las tiene bien cuidadas, es así que todos los días  se levanta para prepara el desayuno para sus hijos que se van al colegio, luego ella y su  esposo  se prepara para dirigirse a los campos a cultivar las plantas café, cacao, palillo y barbasco, productos que posteriormente lleva a comercializarlos a los centros de acopio situados en las ciudades de San Francisco y Kimbiri. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que tiene para pasear por los verdes campos de su poblado, lleva 22 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas quienes se encargan de dañar  los capullos de las plantas. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras para incrementar su producción. Este es su quinto crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente si quiere acceder a otro crédito posteriormente. En su banco comunal es un socia, muy alegre y cooperadora. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará insecticidas para la fumigación de insectos que afectan sus cultivos.
texts.en: Lidia is 46 years old and a very simple and hard-working woman. She lives in her own house together with her husband Ernesto, age 49, and their 4 beloved children, for whom they would like to provide a better future. Lidia's farmlands are the best, and she keeps them well cared-for. Every day she gets up to make breakfast for her children who go to school. Later, she and her husband get ready to go out to the fields to cultivate their coffee, cacao, palillo [perfume guava] and barbasco plants, products which she later takes to sell in the wholesale centers located in the cities of San Francisco and Kimbiri. What she likes most about her work is the freedom she has to wander through the green fields of her village. She has been doing this work for 22 years, and she thinks the most difficult part is protecting her crops from the pests which attack the buds of the plants. With time, she would like to buy more land to increase her production. This is her fifth loan with MFP, and she knows that she has to make all of her payments punctually if she would like to have access to another loan afterward. In her communal bank, she is a very cheerful and cooperative member. With the loan she is requesting, she will buy insecticides to fumigate her crops against the insects that affect them.

loans.use: to buy insecticides to fumigate her crops

loans.name: Fatou Kiné

texts.fr: Madame Fatou  Kiné D. est une femme mariée de 41 ans. Elle habite dans la localité de Yoff. Elle est mère de 5 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 8 et 24 ans. Elle a aussi en charge un de  ses petits fils. Elle est vendeuse de sandwich et de ragout. Elle a une expérience de plus  de 20ans dans cette activité. Son mari est chauffeur et elle a choisi cette activité dans le but de l’aider dans les charges quotidiennes. Sa maman l’a aussi beaucoup influencé dans son choix car cette dernière exerçait  cette même  activité qui lui a permis d’acquérir une maison. Madame D. est membre du guichet de Yoff depuis novembre 2003. Elle a déjà remboursé 7 prêts antérieurs   au sein de l’institution. Elle sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de tissus destinés à la vente. Elle souhaite diversifier son activité de commerce. Son objectif est  d’accroitre son épargne.
texts.en:
Ms. Fatou Kiné D. is a 41-year-old married woman. She lives in the town of Yoff. She is the mother of five children, aged 8 to 24.  She also has one of her grandchildren to support. Fatou is a seller of sandwiches and stews. Ms. D. has over twenty years of experience in this business. Her husband is a chauffeur, and she has chosen this work with the goal of helping him with day-to-day expenses. Her mom has influenced her a lot in her choice, since her mother used to do this same work. It has enabled her to acquire a house.

Ms. D. has been a member of the Yoff branch office since November 2003. She has already repaid seven previous loans with this micro-finance institution. She is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs for buying cloth for resale. She wishes to diversify her commerce. Her goal is to grow her savings.

loans.use: to buy "thioub" cloth

loans.name: Jesutin Group

texts.fr: JESUTIN est un groupe de quatre personnes, dont les membres vivent ensemble dans le même quartier et pratiquent tous la même religion. La présidente du groupe, Cécile (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est née le 22 Novembre 1961 à Porto-Novo, capitale administrative du Bénin. C'est une veuve et mère de trois enfants, tous scolarisés, mais qui ne sont plus à sa charge. Cécile vit donc seule et s'est installée depuis neuf ans au quartier Gbokpa à Djèrègbé dans la commune de Sèmè-Podji au Bénin. Il y a environs neuf ans que Cécile fait le commerce de noix de coco et de friperies de façon secondaire à son domicile. Cécile achète ses produits à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin. Cécile avait bénéficié de crédits auprès de ALIDé, crédits qu'elle avait tous bien remboursés. Face à la demande de plus en plus croissante de sa cliente, Cécile ambitionne augmenter son fonds de roulement et rehausser le niveau de son activité, afin de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle. C'est la raison pour laquelle Cécile sollicite à nouveau un financement de ALIDé. Dans l'avenir, Cécile envisage acheter une parcelle et s'y installer.
texts.en:
JESUTIN is a group of four people whose members live together in the same neighborhood and practice the same religion. 

Cecile, the group's president (seen in the photo with her hand raised), was born November 22, 1961 in Porto-Novo, Benin's administrative capital. She is a widow and the mother of three independent children, all of whom have attended school. Cecile, who lives alone, settled 9 years ago in Gbopka, a district of Djèrègbé in the town of Sèmè-Podji, in Benin. 

Cecile started to sell coconuts and used clothing from her house about 9 years ago. She gets her merchandise in Dantokpa, Benin’s international market. Previous loans obtained from ALIDé were all fully repaid. Facing a steadily increasing demand from her client base, Cecile wants to increase her working capital and bolster her activities to better meet the needs of her customers. This is why she is seeking another loan from ALIDÉ. 

In the future, Cecile would like to buy a piece of land and settle there.

loans.use: to buy coconuts, used clothing and various other items

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
el señor Carlos Alberto M. C. tiene 51 años de edad, vive en el barrio Fatima de San Marcos de Colon y se dedica a la venta de mariscos, frutas y legumbres, tiene su puesto en el mercado de San Marcos de Colon, Carlos le distribuye sus productos a gran cantidad de personas y tambien a varios restaurantes y comedores de la localidad.
Carlos se levanta todos los dias a las 5 de la mañana para alistar su producto y estar a las 6 de la mañana abriendo su puesto en el mercado.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de pescado, camarones, peras, manzanas, uvas, repollo, papas, jilotes, tomates platanos, panelas de azucar.
su meta es hacer crecer mas su negocio para obtener mayores ganancias y asi darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Carlos Alberto M. Calderón, 51, lives in the Fátima neighborhood in San Marcos de Colón.  He sells seafood, fruit and vegetables in a stand located in the San Marcos de Colón market.  He sells his products to a large number of people as well as to several local restaurants and eateries.
Carlos rises daily at 5am to get his products ready in order to open up his stand in the market for business at 6am.

He will use the loan to buy fish, shrimp, pears, apples, grapes, cabbage, potatoes, corn, tomatoes, bananas and brown sugar.  His goal is to grow in business and obtain greater profits to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fish, shrimp, pears, apples, grapes, cabbage, potatoes, corn, brown sugar.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
la señora Claudia L. tiene 29 años de edad, vive en el Barrio el Cafetal de San Marcos de Colon y se dedica a la venta de ropa usada americana, tiene 2 años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad, Claudia vende este tipo de mercaderria a personas que vienen de aldeas como El Espino, El Banquito, San Francisco.
su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado de San Marcos y esto hace que sus ingresos sean favorables ya que por este lugar transitan muchas personas.
desea hacer crecer su negocio y tener buenas ganancias para darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
El credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa para verano calsonetas, camisetas, blusas, chancletas. en estos momentos tiene muchos pedidos y desea poder cubrir con toda la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mrs. Claudia L., 29, lives in the Cafetal neighborhood in San Marcos de Colón; she sells used American clothes.  She’s been in this line of work for two years.  She sells this type of merchandise to people who come from the villages of El Espino, El Banquito and San Francisco.  Her business is located in the San Marcos market which causes her income to be good because this is a spot with lots of foot traffic.  She wants to expand her business and have good profits to provide a better quality of life for her family.

She will use the loan to buy summer clothes: shorts, shirts, blouses and sandals.  She has many pending orders at present and she wants to be able to meet all of her customer demand.

loans.use: to buy summer clothes.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita tiene 37 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Darío de 40 años y sus 04 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Los arduos trabajos que realiza Margarita junto a su esposo en su chacra han hecho que sus cultivos estén muy bien cuidados y que los días de venta, sus productos sean rápidamente comprados. Su principal fuente de ingreso, es la venta de productos de cacao, café y hojas de coca, las cuales vende a las empresas acopiadoras situados en la ciudad de San Francisco. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras, lleva 17 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plaga de insectos que pueden afectar sus plantas. Con el tiempo desea adquirir nuevas tierras, para ampliar sus cultivos. Es el quinto crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual con sus cuotas de pago, en su banco comunal es una socia muy responsable. Con el crédito solicitado, será para la adquisición de semillas de barbasco, ya que cuenta con 02 hectáreas de terreno para poder cultivarlas.
texts.en: Margarita is 37 years old. She is a very cheerful and hard-working woman who lives in her own house together with her husband Darío, age 40, and their 4 beloved children, for whom they would like to provide a better quality of life. The hard work carried out by Margarita together with her husband on their fields has resulted in crops that are very well cared-for, and on sales days, her products are purchased rapidly. Her main source of income is the sale of cacao, coffee and coca leaves, which she sells to the wholesale companies located in the city of San Francisco. What she likes best about her work is harvesting her fields. She has done this work for 17 years, and she thinks the most difficult part is protecting her crops from the insect pests that can affect her plants. With time, she would like to acquire new fields to expand her crops. This is her fifth loan with MFP, and she has been very punctual with her payments. In her communal bank, she is a very responsible member. With the loan she is requesting, she will buy barbasco seeds, since she has 2 hectares of land where she can cultivate them.

loans.use: to buy barbasco seeds

loans.name: Banco Mujer Manos Unidas Cumpliendo Sueños Group

texts.es:
Doña Ruth M. , es la presidenta del grupo.Tiene 48 años , vive en unión de hecho con su esposo y tres hijos.Sólo pudo terminar su escuela primaria.
Ella con apoyo de una sobrina conforman el grupo , reciben la capacitación de Banco Mujer .
Este es el primer crédito.
Ella por herencia familiar siempre ha estado vinculada a la cría de cerdos.Pero quiere hacerlo con dinero suyo, por eso solicita a la fundación mediante el banco mujer el crédito.
Comparará tres cerditos para engordar y alimento.
Los obstáculos que puede enfrentar , son las enfermedades que atacan a los animales y bajas en el precio de la carne del cerdo , o competencia muy fuerte en la zona.
Ell tiene participación en su comunidad, forma parte de un grupo de mujeres que desarrollan agricultura hidropónica como forma de proteger el ambiente y alternativaa generadora de ingresos.
Ella en tiempos pasados enfrentó serios problemas de violencia doméstica pero con apoyo profesional pudo superalo.
Todos los días participa en las tareas propias de su casa, apoya en la cría de cerdos y dos veces a la semana participa en el proyecto comunitario de hidroponía.

El crédito reforzará su autoestima, al tener independencia económica lograda mediante la generación de ingresos por la venta de cerdos.
Contribuir a que los hijops estudien y vivan mejor.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ruth M., 48, is the group President.  She lives in a de facto marriage with her husband and three children.  She was only able to complete elementary school.  With support from a niece the group was formed.  Banco Mujer trained them.  This is the first loan.

Because of family tradition she’s always been involved in raising pigs.  However, she wants to do it with her own resources so is asking the Fundación for a loan through Banco Mujer.  She will buy three piglets and feed to fatten them up. Some of the obstacles she might have to face are illnesses that attack the animals and drops in the price of pork or heavy competition in the area.

She is participative in her community; she’s part of a group of women who are developing hydroponic farming as a way of preserving the environment and as an alternative source of income.

In the past she was a victim of domestic violence but was able to overcome it thanks to professional help.

Every day she participates in household chores, helps care for the pigs and twice a week participates in the community’s hydroponics project.

The loan will strengthen her self esteem through the economic independence she’ll reach through the income generated by the pig sales and contribute to her children’s schooling and that they live better.

loans.use: to buy six piglets and feed for them.

loans.name: Maria Irma

texts.es:
La señora Maria Irma T. tiene 64 años de edad, vive en el barrio el campo viejo de San Marcos de Colon y tiene un comedor en el cual vende desayunos, almuerzos, cenas y gran variedad de golosinas.
Maria tiene muchos clientes, esto debido a que sus comidas tienen muy buen sabor y los precios de venta son accesibles para las personas de la comunidad.
Maria se levanta todos los dias a las 6 de la mañana para empezar a elaborar sus comidas y asi de esta manera
complacer los gustos de cada unos de sus clientes.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de carne de res, cerdo y pollos, chorizos, mortadela, jamon, arroz, frijoles, aceite, manteca, refrescos, tortillas, platanos, condimentos, verduras.
su meta es seguir creciendo con su negocio y tener una  mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. María Irma T., 64, lives in the Campo Viejo neighborhood in San Marcos de Colón; she has a dining room where she sells breakfasts, lunches and dinners as well as a wide variety of snacks.

María has many customers because her meals are very tasty and prices are accessible to people in the community.  She rises daily at 6am to start making her meals in order to please each of her customer’s taste.

She will use the loan to buy beef, pork and chicken, sausages, mortadella, ham, rice, beans, oil, lard, soft drinks, tortillas, bananas, condiments and vegetables.  Her goal is to continue growing with her business and to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beef, pork and chicken, sausages, mortadella, ham, rice, beans, oil, lard, soft drinks, tortillas, bananas, condiments and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pants, skirts, dresses, suits, and shorts to sell, as well as some fruits to prepare natural soft drinks

loans.name: Ayitchedote Group

texts.fr: AYITCHEDOTE est un groupe constitué de trois personnes et dont la présidente (dont la main est levée sur la photo) est nommée Mondoukpè. Les membres du groupe sont des amies et vivent ensemble dans le même quartier.  Née le 21 Janvier 1975 à Adjohoun dans le département de l'Ouémé, Mondoukpè vit depuis sa naissance à Dangbo dans l'Ouémé. Mondoukpè est mariée à un certain Djiman et a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés. Mondoukpè assure ensemble avec son mari les différentes charges de la maison. Depuis une dizaine d'année, Mondoukpè fait le commerce de gaz-oil et parallèlement, Mondoukpè vend de l'huile à moteur non loin de chez elle. Mondoukpè se ravitaille au Nigéria, État voisin du Bénin. C'est la première fois que Mondoukpè sollicite un financement auprès de ALIDé, afin d'agrandir son activité et d'accroître son chiffre d'affaire et son revenu. Dans l'avenir, Mondoukpè désire acquérir une parcelle et construire une maison.
texts.en: Ayitchedote is a group made up of three people, whose president (whose hand is raised) is named Mondoukpè.  The group members are friends and live together in the same neighborhood.  Born on January 21, 1975 in Adjohoun in the Ouémé district, Mondoukpè has lived all her life in Dangbo in Ouémé.  Mondoukpè is married to one Djiman and has four children, all in school.  Mondoukpè, along with her husband, takes care of the different household responsibilities.  For a dozen years, Mondoukpè has sold gas and, at the same, Mondoukpè sells motor oil not far from her home.  Mondoukpè refuels in Nigeria, Benin's neighbor country.  This is the first time Mondoukpè has asked for a loan from ALIDé, in order to grow her business and her sales and revenue.  In the future, Mondoukpè would like to acquire a parcel of land and build a house.

loans.use: To purchase barrels of gas and motor oil

loans.name: Ylaria

texts.es: Ylaria tiene 28 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Fernando de 29 años y sus 02 queridos hijos Gabriel de 08 años y paúl de 03 años de edad, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. En su querido pueblo de Santa Rosa, Ylaria ha pasado la mayor parte de su vida, desde muy niña aprendió la actividad agrícola, hoy trabaja en sus propias tierras al lado de su esposo donde juntos cultivan cacao, café y hojas de coca, trabajo que le ha brindado los ingresos necesarios para cubrir la necesidades de sus hijos. Todo lo cosechado, lo vende en los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad de San Francisco, lugar donde percibe mejores precios por cada uno de sus productos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 09 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que los carros de carga son muy escasos por esta parte de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Con el tiempo, desea comprar nuevas tierras, con el fin de incrementar su producción. Es el quinto crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores créditos y espera serlo también ahora, en su banco comunal es muy activa y es muy querida por el resto de las socias. Con el crédito solicitado comprará abonos y fertilizantes para mejorar su producción de cacao y café.
texts.en: Ylaria is 28 years old. She is a very cheerful and hard-working woman, who lives in her own house together with her husband Fernando, age 29, and their 2 beloved children, Gabriel, age 8, and Paúl, age 3, for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. Ylaria has spent the greater part of her life in her beloved village of Santa Rosa. Since she was a very young girl, she has learned how to farm; today she works on her own fields at her husband's side, where together they grow cacao, coffee and coca leaves. This work has provided the income necessary to cover the needs of her children. She sells everything she harvests to the wholesale centers located in the city of San Francisco, where she receives better prices for each of her products. What she likes most about her work is planting her fields, and she does this with great care. She has done this work for 9 years, and she thinks the most difficult part is transporting her products, since cargo vehicles are very scarce in this part of the rainforest zone of the Apurimac river valley. With time, she would like to buy new lands, with the aim of increasing her production. This is her fifth loan with MFP; she has been very punctual with her previous loans and she plans to continue in the same way. In her communal bank, she is very active and very well-liked by the rest of the members. With the loan she is requesting, she will buy compost and fertilizers to improve her cacao and coffee production.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers

loans.name: Rokhaya

texts.fr: o	Madame Rokhaya  B. est une femme mariée de 38 ans. Elle  habite à Yoff. Elle est mère de 3 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 7 et 15ans. Elle a aussi en  charge 2 personnes. Elle évolue dans le domaine de la restauration. Elle gère un restaurant chez elle depuis plus de 20 ans. C’est une activité qu’elle a choisi sous l’influence de sa mère. L’objectif recherché est la réalisation de bénéfices. Madame B. est sociétaire au guichet de Yoff depuis aout 2010. Elle a déjà remboursé un prêt antérieur. Elle sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de denrées pour son restaurant d’une part et d’autre part  pour l’achat de quelques portables a Rosso et qui seront destinés a la vente. L’accroissement de ses bénéfices lui permettra d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Mrs. Rokhaya B. is a 38-year-old married woman.  She lives in Yoff.  She is the mother of three children, between 7 and 15 years of age.  She also cares for 2 people.  She has developed in the food-serving domain.  She has managed a restaurant out of her home for more than 20 years.  She chose the business under her mother's influence.  The sought-after goal is to make a profit.  Madame B. has been a member of the Yoff office since August 2010.  She has already reimbursed an earlier loan.  She is asking for a loan of 150,000 frs, anticipated to be used in part to purchase goods for her restaurant, and in part to buy some cell phones in Rosso, which will be intended for resale.  The growth of her profits will allow her to better her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase goods and cell phones

loans.name: Llankay Huayna Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LLANKAY HUAYNA”; Este banco está ubicado en la provincia de Urubamba, departamento de Cusco.

La Sra. Mayda, es separada y tiene 34 años de edad, ella tiene 2 hijos de 13 y 9 años de edad; la socia trabaja en la municipalidad de Urubamba en el área administrativa, ella trabaja aquí desde hace 2 años y paralelo a este trabajo ella vende productos de belleza de la línea unique y viene vendiendo desde hace 7 años, ella aprovecha que tiene amigas y amigos en la municipalidad y les da sus catálogos de belleza para que ellos hagan pedidos, la socia solicita el préstamo en esta ocasión para poder aumentar a un dinero que tiene guardo y poder así comprar una computadora de último modelo para sus hijos y que esta les ayude en sus estudios, la socia pagara con su sueldo las cuotas.

Los otros socios del banco comunal se dedican a la docencia, crianza de animales menores, dentista en hospital del seguro, venta de verduras, restaurante, abarrotes, hostal. Vemos en la parte superior de la foto grupal al Sr. Joaquin, que llego un poco tarde y le tomamos la foto a el solo por que dos de los socios fotografiados se retiraron con permiso a sus trabajos.
 
La socia valora y agradece el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas de forma disciplinada.
texts.en: The "Llankay Huayna" community bank is located in the province of Urubamba, department of Cusco, Peru. One of the members is Mayda, a 34-year-old divorced mother of two children, ages 13 and 9. She makes a living as a city administrator in Urubamba. She has worked there for the past two years, and along with this job she also sells Unique-brand cosmetic products, which she has been doing for seven years. She takes advantage of having friends in the city and gives them the cosmetic catalogs so they can place their orders. She is requesting the loan at this time to add to her funds so she can purchase the latest computer for her children to help with their studies. She plans to repay the loan with her salary. The other members of the community bank make a living in teaching, raising small animals, dentistry, selling vegetables, running a restaurant, running a general store and running a hostel. In the upper left corner of the group photo is Joaquin, who arrived a little late, so his photo was taken by himself because two of the other members had already left to get back to their jobs. The members value and are grateful for the loan, and they promise to make their payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase a computer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Juntos Podemos Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “JUNTOS PODEMOS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Jesusa; ella es casada y tiene 43 años y 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de verduras, ella vende tomates, cebollas, zanahorias, pepinos entre otras verduras, la socia vende en el mercado de Huancaro y los días sábados y domingos vende en el mercado de San Sebastián desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar toda variedad de verduras.

Los otros socios  se dedican la venta de frutas, venta de artesanía, salón de belleza, venta de comida y servicio de transporte.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: The "Juntos Podemos" community bank is located in the district, province and department of Cusco, Peru. One of the members is Jesusa, a 43-year-old mother of four children. She makes a living selling vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, carrots and peppers, among other items. She sells at the Huancaro market, and on Saturdays and Sundays she sells at the San Sebastián market from 7 a.m. until 5 p.m. Jesusa wants to improve and expand her business, and is requesting the loan to purchase all kinds of vegetables. The other members make a living selling fruits, selling handicrafts, running a beauty salon, selling food, and providing transportation services. The members are grateful to those who have made this possible and promise to make their payments in the established time.

loans.use: to purchase all kinds of vegetables

loans.name: Corazon De Jesus Group

texts.es:
Este Comité se formó gracias a las Sras. Eudelia B. y Anacleta V., quienes se habían acercado hasta la Oficina de la Fundación Paraguaya para interiorizarse más acerca del Programa de Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, las mismas invitaron a sus amigas y compañeras del Barrio y decidieron sumarse al trabajo grupal para salir adelante y así mejorar su estilo de vida, son 19 mujeres trabajadoras y humildes que deben ganarse el sustento todos los días.
La sra. Eudelia se dedica a la cría y venta de aves de corral, en especial de gallinas, posee su gallinero en su propia casa y por eso se facilita el tiempo que le dá al cuidado de él.
Ella es una mujer con muchas necesidades económicas, pero desea superar la pobreza en la que se encuentra, por ello confía en Kiva y solicita el crédito para la compra de más aves y medicamentos para sus cuidados.
texts.en:
This committee came into being thanks to Mrs. Eudelia B. and Mrs. Anacleta V.. They had visited the office of Fundación Paraguaya to learn more about the Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras (Committee of Enterprising Women) Program. The women invited their friends and neighbors. They decided to work together to get ahead and thus improve their quality of life. The committee is made up of 19 hard-working, humble women who have to earn their living every day.
Mrs. Eudelia works raising and selling poultry, hens in particular. Her henhouse is in her own home. This makes it easier to spend time taking care of the henhouse.
She is a woman with many economic needs, but she wants to overcome the poverty in which she lives. For this, she turns to Kiva. She requests this loan to go towards the purchase of more birds and medicine to look after them.

loans.use: To buy hens and medicines for poultry.

loans.name: Willmer

texts.es: El señor Willmer es ayudante: trabaja con su tío que es maestro albañil. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de una computadora ya que el estudia la carrera de veterinaria. Así podrá realizar sus trabajos con mayor rapidez. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona Villa Ingenio en la ciudad de El Alto. Es soltero y no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en: Wilmer is a construction assistant, working with his uncle, who is a master builder. He is requesting the loan to purchase a computer since he is studying to become a veterinarian and it will allow him to do his work more quickly. He lives in his parents' home in the Villa Ingenio area of the city of El Alto. He is single and has no children. This is the first loan he has requested from Kiva partner IMPRO.

loans.use: to purchase a computer

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es: El señor Sergio es empleado. Con el dinero del préstamo construirá una loza de hormigón  nueva. Vive en casa propia el cual esta ubicado en la zona de Obispo Bosque de la ciudad de La Paz. Es casado y tiene cinco hijos.
texts.en: Sergio is an employee. He is requesting the loan to build a new concrete foundation. He lives in his own home located in the Obispo Bosque area of the city of La Paz. He is married and has five children.

loans.use: to build and waterproof a new concrete foundation

loans.name: Olga

texts.es: Olga de 30 años, nacida en el distrito de Santa Rosa; esta casada con Frank de 35 años de edad y tienen 03 hijos. Juntos viven en su propia casa donde reina la  armonía. Olga y su pareja son el pilar de sus hijos, desde muy niña sus padres le enseñaron a arar la tierra; ella es campesina y cuenta con 04 hectáreas de terreno donde cultiva plantas de café y cacao; plantas originarias de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Hace 11 años que se dedica a esta actividad, y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los peones quienes se encargan de cosechar y trasladar los frutos hasta los secaderos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar los frutos de las plantas; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde su comunidad hasta los centros de acopio; lugar donde comercializa lo cosechado. En el futuro desea comprar nuevas tierras e incrementar su producción con plantas de café.
