Este es su quinto crédito con MFP, se siente en la obligación de pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, en donde es muy querida. Con el crédito solicitado más sus ahorros acumulados comprarán un lote de terreno en la ciudad de Santa Rosa.
texts.en: Olga is 30 years old and a native of the district of Santa Rosa. She is married to Frank, 35, and they have three children. They live together in harmony in their own home. Olga and her husband are the pillars for their children, who from a very early age were taught how to tend the land. Olga is a farmer and has four hectares of land where she cultivates coffee and cocoa, plants that originated from the rain forest area in the Apurimac River Valley. She has been dedicated to this activity for the past 11 years, and at harvest time she counts on the support of hired laborers to harvest the crops and transport them to to be dried. What she likes most about her work is harvesting the plants since she can see her months of hard work be repaid with quality fruit. The task she considers to be the most difficult is transporting the products from her community to the commercial centers where she sells her items. In the future she wants to purchase more land and expand her coffee production. This is her fifth loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she feels proud to have repaid every loan punctually since she doesn't want to cause problems for her much loved fellow members of her community bank. With the loan and her accumulated savings, she plans to purchase a plot of land in the city of Santa Rosa.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land to cultivate coffee

loans.name: Justino

texts.es: El señor Justino es chofer. Con el dinero del préstamo comprara material de construcción como arena, cemento, ladrillos. El cliente desea construir el muro frontal y colocar el garaje. Vive en casa propia el cual esta ubicado en la zona San Martín de la ciudad de  La Paz. Es casado y tiene tres hijos.
texts.en: Mr. Justino is a driver.  With the loan proceeds he will buy construction materials such as sand, cement, bricks.  The client wants to build a front wall and set up a garage.  He lives in his own house located in the San Martin area of the city of La Paz.  He is married and has three children.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita tiene 33 años, nacida en el distrito de Santa Rosa, convive con Edward de 35 años de edad y tienen 04 hijos y juntos viven en su propia casa en la ciudad de Santa Rosa. Margarita y su pareja son el pilar de sus hijos, desde muy niña se dedicó a la agricultura, actualmente es campesina y cuenta con 04 hectáreas de terreno donde siembra plantas de café y barbasco  que son oriundas de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurímac.  Ella realiza esta actividad durante 10 años y considera que les gusta la temporada de cosecha, por que puede ver la recompensa en la calidad de sus frutos, gracias al arduo trabajo y tiempo de dedicación que le pone en sus campos. Sin embargo lo más difícil es transportar sus productos hasta la ciudad de San Francisco lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios, además ni cuenta con suficiente capital para invertir y pagar a los jornaleros para que le ayuden en las cosecha; es por ello que acude a los crédito que facilita la Institución MFP. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es sembrar más plantas de café ya que cuenta con 01 hectárea de terreno por cultivar. Este su quinto crédito de Margarita con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles solicitados, realizará el pago a los jornaleros quienes se encargaran en cosechar los frutos café y barbasco.
texts.en:
Margarita is 33 years old and was born in the District of Santa Rosa. She lives with Edward, age 35, and their four children in their own home in the city of Santa Rosa. Margarita and her partner are the providers for their children. She has been farming since she was a young girl and now she has four hectares of land on which she grows coffee and barbasco, plants that are native to the rain forests of the Apurímac River Valley. Margarita has been farming for ten years and considers the harvest season to be her favorite part of her job because she is rewarded with quality fruit for all the hard work and time committed to working in her fields. However, the most difficult part is transporting her products to the city of San Francisco where she offered the best prices.

Margarita does not have enough capital to invest in paying her workers to help with the harvest. For this reason, she is seeking to secure a loan from MFP. Her greatest priority at the moment is to sow more coffee plants because she has one hectare of land that needs to be cultivated. This is her fifth loan with MFP. Margarita knows that if she submits her payments on time, then she will be able to access future loans with greater ease. The loan of 2000 PEN that she requested will be used to pay her workers who are in charge of harvesting coffee and barbasco.

loans.use: To pay her workers for assisting her with the harvest.

loans.name: José David

texts.es: José David se dedica a brindar el servicio de nintendo. Hace  como parte de su propia fuente de ingresos, inicio como la necesidad de fuente de ingreso, ya que tiene que mantener a su familia, sin embargo lo supera ofreciendo el mejor servicio en los videos juegos. Esto le llena de satisfacción y ánimo para continuar en este negocio por lo que desea mejorar y abastecerse de más productos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de discos, controles, reparación de televisores, mesas entre otros productos para agrandar su negocio. Sueña con agrandar cada día más su actividad y proporcionarle los ingresos necesarios.
texts.en:
José David offers a Nintendo service. He does this for part of his income, and started the business because he needed a source of income in order to support his family. He gets ahead by offering the best video game service. This makes him feel very satisfied and excited to continue with his business, which he would like to improve and stock with more products.

He will use the requested loan to invest in games, controls, television repair, and tables, among other products to expand his business. He dreams of growing his business a little more each day and of providing the earnings his family needs.

loans.use: to invest in games, controls, television repairs, tables, and other products to expand his business

loans.name: Inaydina

texts.es: Inaydina, D. 26 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Francisco D. 30 años y su querido hijo Antonio D. 04 años D. edad, quien es el motivo D. todos sus esfuerzos. Los productos que con tanto esfuerzo y dedicación han logrado cultivar Inaydina  y su pareja, le han ayudado mucho en el progreso D. su vida. Todas las mañanas empieza a trabajar en sus tierras, ya que sabe que del cuidado que le brinD. a sus sembríos D. cacao, café y hojas D. coca, dependerá L. calidad D. los productos que obtenga, pero para el tiempo D. cosecha necesita del apoyo D. los jornaleros, quienes le ayudan en las extracciones D. los productos. Lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y se siente muy feliz cuando los ve grandes y abundantes, lleva 05 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil, es llevar lo cosechado hasta los centros D. acopio ubicado en L. ciudad D. San Francisco, que es el lugar donD. los venD., ya que los sacos en donD. lleva los productos son muy pesados; con el crédito solicitado adquirirá semillas D. café y repoblara sus sembríos. En adelante, espera mejorar sus productos, para así poder obtener mejores precios. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente y está dispuesta a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy solidaria y responsable. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará semillas D. café, con lo cual espera asegurar sus futuras cosechas.
texts.en:
Inaydina, age 26, is a cheerful hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her husband Francisco, age 30, and their beloved four-year-old son Antonio who is the reason behind all of her efforts. The crops that Inaydina and her partner cultivate with great effort have helped them make progress in life. Every morning they start the work on their land because they know that the care they proviD. to their cacao, coffee, and coca leaf crops will determine the quality of the final product. During the harvest season, she needs the assistance of workers who help with collecting the produce. What she enjoys most about her work is caring for her crops because she feels happy when her plants grow to be large and fruitful. Inaydina has been farming for five years and considers the most difficult part to be carrying her harvested products to the collection centers in the city of San Francisco, the place where she sells. The sacks of produce can be very heavy.

The loan she is requesting will be used to acquire coffee seedlings in order to replenish her crops. Going forward, she hopes to improve her products in order to obtain better prices. This is her fifth loan with MFP. Inaydina knows that she must submit all of her payments on time and is willing to do so. She is a very supportive and responsible member of her Communal Bank. The loan of 1000 PEN that she requested will be used to purchase coffee seedlings in hopes of securing her future harvests.

loans.use: to purchase coffee seedlings.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa tiene 42 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Isaías de 45 y sus 04 queridos hijos. Con mucho esfuerzo Rosa ha logrado trabajar sus tierras y volverlas muy productivas, ella cultiva, cacao, café, barbasco y hojas de coca, productos que luego los lleva a vender hasta los centros de acopio situados en la ciudades de San Francisco y Kimbiri, donde los vende al por mayor. Sus cultivos le han dado los ingresos necesarios para mantenerse y sustentar los gastos de educación de sus queridos hijos; es por ello que pone todas sus ganas en sacar adelante sus cultivos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos, ya que se siente muy feliz haciéndolo, lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos. Para más adelante, desea comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar su producción. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en su anterior crédito y espera serlo también ahora. En su banco comunal es una socia muy participativa y siempre esta al tanto de los acuerdos a los que llegan en su grupo. Con el crédito solicitado comprará estiércol de animales para fertilizar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 42, is a hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her husband Isaías, age 45, and their four beloved children. With great effort, Rosa works her land and is able to achieve very productive returns. She grows cacao, coffee, barbasco, and coca leaves. The products are later sold in bulk at the collection centers located in the cities of San Francisco and Kimbiri. Her crops provide the necessary income to maintain and support the educational expenses of her children. For this reason, Rosa does everything she can to make sure her crops yield successful results. What she enjoys most about her work is caring for her crops because it makes her feel happy. Rosa has been farming for 20 years and considers the most difficult part to be transporting her products. Going forward, she wants to buy additional farmland so that she can increase her production.

This is her fifth loan with MFP. Rosa was very prompt with her previous loan and she hopes to do the same with this current one. She is an active participant in her Communal Bank and always aware of the agreements that have been reached within her group. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy animal manure for fertilizing her crops.

loans.use: To buy animal manure for fertilizing her crops.

loans.name: Martha Elena

texts.es: Martha de 46 años de edad, casada, su esposo soldador por cuenta propia, con su professión de maestra han salido adelante juntos, mujer emprendedora además da clase particulares, sus planes que sus hijos se preparen para un mejor futuro, la seguridad es primordial ya que su proyecto es mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda, requiriendo del préstamo que será invertido en la compra de materiales de construcción: cemento, hierro, arena, piedrín, bloque, piedra cantera, alambre de amarre, estribu, camisa, clavo de acero, tablones, laminas de zinc entre otros materiales. Para construir un cuarto que lo está necesitando para cerrar parte de su casa. Agradece a la financiera por su apoyo al desarrollo de su familia ante la sociedad.
texts.en: Martha is 46 years old and married.  Her husband is a welder and works independently.  Martha is a teacher and works with other enterprising women in providing private lessons.  Her plans for her children are to prepare them for a better future.  Their safety is a high priority and the project she will undertake is to improve the infrastructure of her home.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of construction materials such as cement, iron, sand, blocks, quarry stone, wire, buttresses, lining, steel nails, planks, sheets of zinc, and other supplies to build a room that she needs to close off part of her house.  Martha is grateful for the financial support that will help her family develop as part of society.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials needed for building a room.

loans.name: San Antonio Iii Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres San Antonio III se formo con la union D. varias vecinas D. la comunidad D. 8000 Bertoni, D. la ciudad D. San Ignacio.
Las integrantes del comité están en el cuarto Ciclo con 10 integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca en el barrio por ser muy unido, solidario y responsable, las integrantes poseen un gran espíritu emprendedor, en etapas anteriores han estado al día con las cuotas y pretenden terminar esta etapa con muy buen cumplimiento D. responsabilidad con la institución en caso D. que adquieran el nuevo crédito.
La sra. Gregoria B. se dedica a la cría D. animales, ella les provee D. alimentos, los hace crecer D. manera sana y luego los venD. para el consumo, por eso posee muy buenas ganancias pues posee mucha calidad en sus productos.
Ella solicita el crédito para poder adquirir más animales, medicamentos y balanceados para ellos.
No es la primera vez que solicitan créditos D. Kiva estas integrantes, por eso confian en que los inversionistas las ayudarán D. nuevo.
texts.en:
The Women’s Committee named “San Antonio III” was formed as a result of several neighbors joining together who are from the community of 8000 Bertoni in the city of San Ignacio. There are ten members in this committee and they are participating in their fourth loan cycle. This group stands out in their neighborhood for being close-knit, supportive and responsible. The members possess a tremendous enterprising spirit that they have demonstrated from previous loan cycles through today. They have handled their loans and completed each cycle with great responsibility. As a result, they are eligible to access a new loan from Fundación Paraguaya.

Sra. Gregoria B. raises animals. She feeds them so that they can grow to be healthy and later sold to the consumer. Gregoria generates very good earnings because of the high quality of her products. She is requesting a loan to buy more animals, medicines, and balanced feed.

This is not the first time these members have requested loans through Kiva. For this reason, they are confident that the lenders will assist them with a new loan.

loans.use: To purchase more animals, medicines, and balanced feed.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce and Rick S. own Frosted Delights by Joyce, a café and bakery located in San Antonio’s “Southtown District” (just south of downtown).  They bake custom-order cakes for weddings and special events, as well as offering coffee, food, and desserts in their café.  A few weeks ago, Joyce and Rick expanded their menu to include deli food, giving customers dining options for any time of the day. 
 
Having baked recreationally for most of her life, Joyce dreamed of someday owning her own bakery.    Prior to opening “Frosted Delights by Joyce,” she spent twenty years working with AT&T.  Rick spent most of his life in the trucking industry and was working as an operations supervisor when the recession forced the company he was working for to eliminate his position.  Instead of looking for a new job in the trucking business, Rick, together with  Joyce, decided to retire from their careers and launch their own business.

Rick and Joyce opened “Frosted Delights by Joyce” in November, 2010.  In the six months they have been in business, they have already developed a loyal clientele.   For them, it is rewarding to see repeat customers walk through their doors because it tells them they are doing a good job.  They hope to continue growing the deli and delivery part of their business by capitalizing on their location close to downtown.  With all of the companies in the area, they see great opportunity for growth.

Rick says that he and Joyce work more hours now than they ever have, but that being personally and emotionally invested in the business makes it all worthwhile.  In addition to the two of them, Frosted Delights by Joyce has two part-time employees.  Joyce and Rick are using this loan to purchase more equipment.  For example, they need more baking pans, and as their business continues to grow, will soon need another oven.

loans.use: to buy equipment: baking pans, snow cone machine, oven.

loans.name: Annette

texts.en:
Annette P. sells MicheTM fashion bags and accessories.  Her primary vending location is a kiosk at Lackland Air Force Base’s exchange, but she also sells at Fort Sam Houston and various special events in and outside of San Antonio.   

Annette likes MicheTM bags because she believes they are unique, fun products.  MicheTM makes “base” bags that people can buy and then customize with special “shells” (covers).  The shells can be changed off and on so that the same bag can have many different looks.  It’s a creative way for fashion-conscious women to have the perfect-looking bag for any occasion.

Originally from New York, Annette settled in San Antonio after serving in the military.  When she first started her business, she was working full-time with Travelocity.  She would work nights at Travelocity, and then go work all day at the kiosk.  Now she devotes all of her time to her business, which allows her to attend and sell at more events.  Last summer, Annette was invited by the Army Air Force Exchange Services to sell bags at military bases in Arizona and New Mexico.  Despite the fact that she had to drive so that she could bring enough inventory, the events were very profitable for her and are something she wants to continue in the future.

Annette is using this loan to increase her inventory.  Because MicheTM frequently updates its product line, she has to have the latest styles so that she can maintain her client base.  By the end of the year, she hopes to buy a van so that she can have more inventory with her when she sells at out-of-state military bases and events.

Annette says she has definitely lost personal time since starting her business.  However, she says it works for her family because her husband is supportive of her and her business, and helps out a lot at home.  Annette’s advice to other aspiring entrepreneurs is to not be afraid.  “I’m not really a salesperson, I’m kind of shy, so it was hard for me to sell something.  I’ve learned that if you just talk to people, you find out what they like, and it is easier to sell things to them.”

loans.use: to buy new inventory for the spring season.

loans.name: Cristo Resucitado Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama CRISTO RESUCITADO el cual esta ubicado en el estado de Puebla, Mexico. El grupo se conformo con 11 integrantes. En la forografia se muestra la actividad comercial a la que se dedica la señora Ofrocina M. Quien se dedica a la venta de ajo, ella tiene 40 años realizando esta actividad pero con 45 años de experiencia, por lo que ya tiene bastante clientela y para atraer a mas, sus precios son bajos, ella sale a vender a otros estados donde vende sus ajos. La señora esta satisfecha con la institucion y agradece la confianza otorgada pues con los prestamos que ha obtenido ha ido creciendo su negocio, ella comenta que este prestamo lo destinara a la compra de más ajo para ampliar su negocio. Ella tiene 63 años y no tiene estudios, su esposo es campesino y tambien sale a vender con ella.
texts.en:
The group called “Cristo Resucitado” (Resurrected Christ) is located in the State of Pueblo in Mexico and has eleven members. The photograph shows the business of one of its members, Sra. Ofrocina M., who sells garlic. She has been in this business for 40 years, but has a total of 45 years worth of experience. Ofrocina already has enough customers, but she is able to attract more because she offers low prices. She travels to other states where the garlic is sold.

Sra. Ofrocina is satisfied with CrediComun and grateful for being entrusted with the loans that have helped to grow her business. She says that this loan will be used to buy more garlic to increase her business. Ofrocina is 63 years old and did not attend school. Her husband is a farmer and also travels with her to sell.

loans.use: To acquire more garlic to sell.

loans.name: Aníbal

texts.es:
El señor Aníbal de 55 años de edad, es soltero, y cuenta con un taller propio de chapería y pintura en su casa, es uno de los pioneros de la ciudad reconocido por su buen servicio y cuenta con clientes de toda la zona.
El empezó trabajando para terceros, luego de mucho esfuerzo se independizo y hace mas de 25 años trabaja por su  cuenta realizando todo tipo de trabajos de chapería y pintura de automotores, ya sea chocados o trabajos de retoque.
Por los años de trabajo constantemente necesita renovar sus herramientas laborales, a eso obedece el pedido de la ayuda crediticia a la  Fundación  Paraguaya, necesita una nueva soldadora pues de esa manera no fallará con sus exigentes clientes.
texts.en:
Sr. Aníbal is 55 years old, single, and manages an auto paint and body shop in his home. He is one of the pioneers of the city and is known for providing good service. His customers come from every area.

Aníbal started working for other people, but after much effort he later became independent. He has performed all types of paint and body work on automobiles for more than 25 years. Aníbal repairs vehicles that have been in accidents or are in need of retouching.

After years of constantly working, he needs to replace the equipment he uses for his job. For this reason, he is requesting assistance by accessing a loan through Fundación Paraguaya. He needs a new soldering machine so that he can complete the work for his existing customers.

loans.use: To purchase a soldering machine.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
Este comité se formó gracias a la señora Celsa M. que vive en la cuidad D. Belén, distrito D. Concepción. La presidenta se motivo en la idea D. producir un bien para sus compañeras, dando una visión futura D. que a través del comité estarían alcanzando el progreso D. cada una.
Encantadas aceptaron conformar el comité D. mujeres emprendedoras nombrándolo Comité Virgen D. Fatima en honor a la virgencita que las bendice (según su fe) en cada reunión realizada por el comité.
El comité cuenta con catorce (14) miembros en donD. la mayoría se dedica a pequeñas actividades desD. la venta D. minutas, mercaderías y hasta la cría D. animales D. tal manera que en un futuro no muy lejano les estaría produciendo una pequeña ganancia a través D. su venta.
Todas tienen la esperanza D. seguir luchando por salir adelante, buscando el progreso D. cada una D. ellas y la D. su comunidad.
La sra. Nilda se dedica a la venta D. minutas desD. hace mucho tiempo, ella genera ingresos D. esta manera para mantener a su familia, además desea poder tener una vejez tranquila, por lo que trabaja mucho para poder ahorrar.
Ella solicita el crédito para comprar harinas, quesos, leche, huevos y otros productos primos para la preparación D. sus minutas.
texts.en:
This committee was formed thanks to the efforts of Sra. Celsa M., who lives in the city of Belén in the District of Concepción. She serves as the president and was motivated by the idea of doing something good for her fellow group members. Celsa had a vision for the future of a committee that would help each member make progress. The members happily accepted her invitation to form this committee of enterprising women called “Virgen D. Fatima” (Our Lady of Fatima) in honor of the Virgin Mary who blesses each committee meeting according to one’s faith.

The committee has 14 members. Most of them engage in small businesses that incluD. selling short order meals, offering merchandise, and raising animals in hopes of generating a small profit in the near future. All of them hope to keep fighting in order to stay ahead. Each day they seek to make progress for themselves and their communities.

Sra. Nilda has been selling short order meals for some time. She earns her income in this manner as a way of supporting her family. In addition, she hopes to have a peaceful retirement so she works hard in order to save. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy flour, cheese, milk, eggs, and other necessary ingredients for preparing her meals.

loans.use: To purchase flour, cheese, milk, eggs, and other necessary ingredients.

loans.name: San Jeronimo X Group

texts.es: El nombre de este grupo es SAN JERONIMO, en honor a su comunidad que se donomina del mismo nombre y se encuenta localizaco en Puebla, México. El grupo esta conformado por 9 integrantes y es su cuarta vez que solicita un prestamo. La señora MINERVA MARGARITA BERMUDES, es la Presidenta del grupo, ella tiene 31 años de edad, estudio unicamente la primaria, casada y tiene tres hijos (9,10 y15 años). Se dedica a la venta de zapato por catalogo; es conocida por sus compañeras por ser una persona responsable y que ha salido adelante ante la adversidad, siendo originaria de esta comunidad ha progresado. El prestamo lo requiere para comprar zapatos por mayoreo y asi obtener mas ganancias. Con las ganancias que obtenga lo utilizará para continuar brindandoles educación a sus hijos y una mejor vida, así como apoyo para los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
The name of this group is “San Jeronimo” in honor of the community of the same name, which is located in Puebla, Mexico. This group consists of nine members and is requesting a loan for the fourth time.

Sra. Minerva Margarita Bermudes is the group president. She is 31 years old and only has an elementary school education. Minerva is married and has three children (ages 9, 10, and 15). She sells shoes through catalogs and is known among her fellow group members for being a responsible person who presses forward despite adversity. Minerva is originally from this community and has made progress. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy shoes in bulk so that she can generate more earnings. The income that she earns will be used to continue providing education for her children, give them a better life, and help cover the family expenses.

loans.use: To purchase shoes in bulk.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es: Joel tiene 31 años de edad, natural del distrito de Santa Rosa, convive con Jenny de 28 años de edad y tienen 02 hijos Javier de 05 años y Ruth de 02 años y juntos residen en su propia casa  donde reina la armonía. La labor que realiza Joel es labrar la tierra, donde viene cultivando plantas de cacao, café, barbasco y  piña, en total cuenta con 03 hectáreas de terrenos ya cultivados con estos frutos. Sus padres le enseñaron ha ejercer esta actividad, actualmente y con los ahorros que logró acumular pudo comprar su propia parcela. Es conocedor del arduo trabajo en el campo; donde viene trabajando 09 años y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros quienes se encargan de trasladar los productos para luego ser comercializados. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo; porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas le resultan, así obteniendo buenas ganancias; cuenta que la  estación de invierno no es de su agrado porque son meses donde abundan mayor cantidad de insectos perjudicando a sus sembríos. El crédito solicitado es para la compra de semillas de plantas de piña y  así poder renovar las plantas de café; por que los frutos de piña le generan mayor ingreso y en menor tiempo. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para así expandir su producción. Este su quinto crédito con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su banco comunal. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más plantas de piña y así poder renovar por plantas de café.
texts.en:
Joel is 31 years old and a native of the District of Santa Rosa. He lives with his wife Jenny, age 28, and their two children Javier and Ruth (ages 5 and 2 respectively). They have their own home where they live in harmony. Joel works on his land where he grows cacao, coffee, barbasco, and pineapple. He has a total of three hectares of land on which he cultivates his crops. His parents taught him how to farm and now he has his own land that he bought with the savings he accumulated. Joel knows how to hard. He has been farming for nine years and has the help of workers during the harvest season who are in charge of collecting the produce so that it can be sold later. Joel is very committed to his work and today he gets to enjoy the fruits of his labor. Although he generates good earnings, he is not pleased with the winter season because of the large population of insects that are present during these months that could harm his crops. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy pineapple seedlings to plant in place of coffee since these fruits generate more income in less time. For now, his greatest priority is to acquire additional farmland so that he can expand his production.

This is his fifth loan with MFP. Joel knows that if he submits his payments on time, he will be able to access more loans from his Communal Bank with greater ease and few complications. The loan of 1000 PEN that he requested will be used to buy more pineapple seedlings to plant in place of his coffee crops.

loans.use: Comprar más plantas de piña.

loans.name: Las Industriales Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama LAS INDUSTRIALES esta ubicado en Tehuacán, Puebla México. El grupo esta conformado por diez personas y es la cuarta ocasión que solicitan un prestamo. La foto fue tomada en la casa donde se hace la reunión, una de las integrantes del grupo es la señora Sofía H., tiene 63 años de edad, estudio solamente la primaria, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y ropa de temporada. Solicita el préstamo para invertir en comprar más productos en variedad y ropa de primavera ya que sus ventas están creciendo, así como en el tiempo de calor, sus clientes la prefieren ya que su trato es muy amable y sus precios son accesibles. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente muy contenta por la oportunidad que se le brinda. También espera con las ganancias apoyar en los gastos familiares y mejorar su casa para una mejor calidad de vida. Observaciones, la persona que no se ve bien en la foto se llama Ines G..
texts.en:
This group is called “Las Industriales” and is located in Tehuacán, Puebla, Mexico. The group consists of ten people and this is the fourth time they are requesting a loan. This photo was taken in the house where they conduct their meetings.

One of the group members is Sra. Sofía H.. She is 63 years old and only has an elementary school education. Sofía sells cosmetics and seasonal clothing. She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of various products and spring clothing so that she can increase her sales now that the weather is warmer. Her customers enjoy the friendly service and affordable prices that she offers. Upon requesting her loan, she was pleased with the opportunity that was given to her. She also hopes that her earnings will enable her to help with the family expenses, improve her home, and produce a better quality of life.

The person who is missing from the photo is Ines G..

loans.use: To purchase various products and seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Grupo Unidas Group

texts.es:
La señora Maria Isabel desD. chica vivía a orillas del río Paraguay con su padres y cinco hermanos: tres varones y dos mujeres; su padre era pescador y su madre vendía pescado.
Cada vez que el río subía tenían que abandonar su casa debido a que esta quedaba bajo agua y en aquella época no existía todavía el muro D. contención, ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el tercer curso por que cuando cumplió quince años su padre les dejó y como ella es la hermana mayor tenía que trabajar para ayudarle a su mamá a criar a sus hermanos.
Empezó a trabajar como empleada doméstica, a los 19 años tuvo su primer hijo y tuvo que irse a trabajar en una estancia como cocinera para poder criarle a su hijo.
Actualmente la señora Isabel vive en la ciudad D. Concepción en el barrio San Francisco con su pareja, Carlos Alberto D. 32 años, quien se dedica a ayudante D. motosierrista, tiene además dos hijos: Daysi D. 15 años y Jose Miguel D. 8 años, actualmente se dedica a la venta D. ropas y zapatos.
Ella es miembro del Comité Grupo Unidas, el cual se formó con 19 integrantes, quienes desean superar la pobreza en la que viven con sus familias, pero necesitan para ello la ayuda económica D. Kiva mediante Fundación Paraguaya, por eso solicitan este crédito, D. modo a que puedan progresar, generar mayores ingresos y percibir una mejor calidad D. vida.
El crédito se invertiría en la compra D. ropas y zapatos para la reventa, teniendo en cuenta que las compras en grandes cantidades reducen los costos y aumentan las ganancias.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel lived on the banks of the River Paraguay with her parents and five siblings (three brothers and two sisters) since she was a little girl.  Her father was a fisherman and her mother sold fish.

Each time the river rose they had to leave their home because it would end up under water.  Back then there was still no retaining wall.  Isabel could only study up to her third year of secondary education because when she was 15 her father abandoned the family and, as the eldest daughter, she had to work to help her mom raise her siblings.

Maria Isabel started working as a cleaner.  At the age of 19 she had her first child and had to go and work on a farm stay as a cook in order to be able to raise her child.

Isabel currently lives in San Francisco neighborhood, in the city of Concepción with her partner, 32 year-old Carlos Alberto, who works as an assistant chainsaw operator.  They have two children: 15 year-old Daysi and 8 year-old José Miguel.  She currently works selling clothes and shoes.

Isabel is a member of the 'Grupo Unidas' committee which has 19 members who all want to escape the poverty that they live in with their families.  However, in order to achieve this they need the financial help of Kiva through Fundación Paraguaya.  They are requesting this loan so that they can make progress, make more income and enjoy a better quality of life.  Isabel will invest her loan in buying clothes and shoes for resale, bearing in mind that purchasing goods in large quantities reduces costs and increases profits.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes

loans.name: Rogoberto

texts.es: Rogoberto tiene 32 años, es un hombre muy alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Epifania de 34 años y sus 03 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Los campos de sembrado que con tanto esfuerzo ha conseguido Rogoberto son el principal sustento que tiene su familia, sus productos, como el café, cacao y hojas de coca son muy solicitados en la ciudad de San Francisco, además que los frutos que cosecha son de buena calidad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembríos de las plaga de insectos que pueden afectar sus plantaciones. Lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar los sacos de sus cultivos, ya que son muy pesados y le quitan mucha energía.. En adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar sus cultivos. Este es el quinto préstamo de Rogoberto con MFP, sabe que el dinero del crédito le será muy beneficioso para el desarrollo de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy alegre y siempre pone orden en las reuniones. Con el crédito solicitado comprará animales de carga como el burro, ya que le será muy útil en los traslados de lo que cosechará.
texts.en:
Rogoberto, age 32, is a cheerful and hardworking man.  He lives in his own house with his wife Epifania, age 34, and their 3 dear children, to whom he wants to offer a better quality of life.  The fields Rigoberto has cultivated with so much effort are the principal source of sustenance for his family.  Their products, like coffee, cacao, and coca leaf, are much sought after in the city of San Francisco.  In addition, the fruits that he harvests are of high quality.

What he likes most about his work is protecting his fields from the plague of insects that can affect his crops.  He has been involved in this business for 15 years.  He considers the most difficult part the transportation of sacks of his produce since they are very heavy and take a lot of energy to move.  In the future, he hopes to buy more land in order to increase his harvests.

This is Rogoberto’s fifth loan with MFP.  He knows that the money from the loan will be very beneficial for the development of his business.  He is a cheerful member of the communal bank and always brings order to the meetings.  With the loan applied for he will an buy animals for carrying cargo, like burros, since they will be very useful in transporting what he harvests.

loans.use: to purchase burros.

loans.name: Narcisa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Narcisa, es originaria de la comarca Chilamatillo ubicada en la comunidad Miraflor – Estelí, tiene 61 años de edad, esta casada, es agricultora y ama de casa también, tiene un hijo, se dedica a sembrar papas, ella lleva 4 años en esta actividad. Inicio con esfuerzos propios sembrando papas, ella se vio motivada al ver a su marido que sembraba hortalizas. Ella también se ha dedicado a la ganadería en esta actividad lleva 20 años comenzó comprando una vaca y luego dos mas hasta lograr tener su propio ganado ,gracias a eso también ha podido sobrevivir , se dedica también a vender gallinas , tiene una pulpería, ha sabido ser una mujer de progresos a pesar de que no sabe leer ni escribir , no pudo aprender pues sus padres no le pudieron pagar estudios ya que eraN muy pobres, eran 10 hermanos y solo tenían para medio comer no le ajustaba para ponerlos a estudiar desde entonces ella se ha dedicado a trabajar. Se caso a los 16 años de edad pero trabajaba en las labores domesticas y del campo.
Solicita el préstamo para sembrar ¼ de manzana cultivo de papas, comprar semillas, insumos. Con esta inversión espera sacar una buena cosecha de papas, con calidad, desea poder ampliar su siembra, mejorar sus ingresos.
Tiene como planes futuros poder sembrar una manzana de papas, surtir de más productos nuevos su pulpería, tener en buenas condiciones su ganado y ser una persona auto sostenible, ahorrar para su retiro.
texts.en: Narcisa is originally from Chilamatillo area of the Miraflor-Estelí community. She is 61 years old, married, and is a farmer and housewife. She has a son, and has grown potatoes for 4 years. She began on her own growing potatoes, inspired by her husband who was growing crops. She also has raised livestock for 20 years, beginning with a cow and then adding two more until she had her own herd. Thanks to this work she has been able to survive. She also sells chickens, has a convenience store, and has known how to be a successful woman even though she doesn’t know how to read or write. She couldn’t learn how to read or write as her parents couldn’t pay for school as they were very poor; there were 10 children and they only had enough to eat which didn’t leave any money left over for school so she has always worked. She married at the age of 16 and has worked as a domestic employee and in the field. She seeks a loan to plant ¼ manzana (1 acre = .57 manzana) of potatoes, buy seeds, and supplies. With this investment she hopes to have a good harvest of quality potatoes. She hopes to be able to expand her planting thus improving her income. She has future plans to plan one manzana of potatoes, stock more new products in her store, and have good conditions for her cattle and be a self-sufficient person, saving for her retirement.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies, and plant potatoes

loans.name: Alboradda Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama ALBORADA esta ubicado en Puebla, México. El grupo esta conformado  por diez personas y es la cuarta ocasión que solicitan un prestamo. La foto fue tomada en la casa D. la señora NARCIZA G. A., integrante del grupo, tiene 41 años D. edad, estudio solamente la primaria, se dedica a la venta D. tortillas D. maíz, tiene en total 3 hijos varones. Solicita el préstamo para invertir en comprar más maíz y refresco ya que sus ventas están creciendo y sus clientes le hacen muchos pedidos, elL. la prefieren ya que su trato es muy amable. Al momento D. solicitar este prestamo ella se siente muy contenta. Sus ganancias las ocupara para que a uno D. sus hijos lo lleve a tomar unas terapias ya que es un niño discapacitado, y así mas adelante pueda desenvolverse por si solo. Observaciones, la persona que no se ve bien en la foto se llama Josefina R..
texts.en:
This group is called ALBORADA and it is located in Puebla, Mexico.  The group has ten members and this is the fourth time that they have requested a loan.  The photo was taken in Narciza G. A.'s home.  Narciza is a member of the group.  She is 41 years old and only completed her primary education.  She has three sons and her business is selling corn tortillas.  She is requesting this loan to buy more corn and soft drinks since her sales are increasing and her customers are making a lot of orders.  They like to buy from her because she treats her customers kindly.  

At the time of requesting this loan, Narciza feels very happy.  She will use the profits she makes to pay for one of her children to have some therapeutic treatment since he is disabled.  This will mean that, in the future, he will be able to manage on his own.

Note: the person who is missing from the photo is Josefina R..

loans.use: to invest in buying more corn and soft drinks

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia de 29 años, natural del distrito de Santa Rosa; esta casada con Percy de 33 años y juntos viven en su propia casa con sus 02 queridos hijos, Samir de 08 años y Estela de 05 años de edad. Sonia y su pareja son el pilar de su familia. Ha Sonia desde muy niña sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra, posee su propia parcela donde viene cultivando plantas de café y hojas de coca. Viene trabajando 10 años en sus propias tierras, En tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros para las extracciones de los frutos y así avanza con mayor  rapidez en cuanto a  sus cosechas. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es recolectar los frutos de las plantas; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicado en la ciudad de san francisco lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus granos y hojas de coca. Su dificultad es no poder contar con suficiente ingreso económico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo con las cosechas; es por ello que acude a los préstamos que facilita la institución MFP. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es sembrar más plantaciones de café por que es una de las plantas que mayor demanda tiene en el mercado. Es el quinto crédito con MFP, siempre ha sido muy puntual en sus pagos y espera serlo ahora también. En su banco comunal es una socia responsable, motivo por el cual es muy querida. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que le brinden el apoyo en las cosechas de café.
texts.en:
Sonia, 29, a native of the Santa Rosa district, is married to Percy, 33, with whom she lives in their own home with their two beloved children: Samir who is 8, and Estela who is 5. Sonia and her partner are the mainstay of their family. From very early on in her childhood Sonia's parents instilled in her the value of working the fields. She has her own plot where she has been growing coffee plants and coca leaves. She has been working her own land for ten years. During harvest season she hires day laborers to extract the beans and thus proceeds more quickly with the harvest. 

The thing she enjoys most about her work is collecting the beans from the plants as she feels then that the months of arduous work are rewarded by the quality of the beans. She believes that the most difficult aspect is transporting her products from the field to the collection centers located in the city of San Francisco [Peru], a place where better prices are to be had for her beans and coca leaves. The difficulty she has is not having enough income to cover advance payments to the workers who help her with the harvesting. Thus she turns to loans provided by the institution MFP. For now the priority however is to plant more coffee because it is one of the crops with the highest demand at market. 

This is her fifth loan with MFP. She has always been quite prompt with her payments and expects to be prompt with this one also. She is a responsible member of her communal bank for which she is much appreciated. With the 1,000 nuevos soles she will hire day workers to help her with the coffee harvest.

loans.use: to hire day workers to help her with the coffee harvest.

loans.name: Trinia

texts.en:
Trinia is a member of the Bienestar ["Well-being"] Communal Bank. She is 36 years old, married, and has three children who are 15, 11 and 7 years old. Trinia sells vegetables and other groceries from her home during the week, and travels to regional fairs and markets on the weekends. She will be using her loan of 2,100 PEN to purchase vegetables and other groceries wholesale. 

She is saving up to remodel her house. She is very happy working at FINCA Peru and really enjoys the solidarity of her bank members and the education, training, and advice that the loan officers provide to her.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables and other groceries to sell

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia tiene 32 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su  pareja John de 35 años y su querida hija Magali de 12 años y lo que mas desea es brindarle una mejor calidad de vida, para lo cual esta dispuesta a trabajar muy duro. Todos los días muy temprano por la mañana, Virginia  y su pareja salen a labrar sus tierras, para ellos no existen días de descanso, ya que tienen que trabajar continuamente su chacra para tener una buena producción y dar el mejor a su querida hija. Sus principales productos de siembra son, el cacao, café, plátano, los cuales vende al por mayor en la ciudad de San Francisco. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que tiene trabajando en sus cultivos, ya que puede disfrutar libremente de sus verdes campos, lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas que pueden afectar. Para el futuro, planea comprar nuevas tierras, con las cuales pueda incrementar sus cultivos. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas y espera serlo ahora también. En su banco comunal es una persona muy querida por el resto de sus compañeras. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más semillas de café, para luego cultivarlas y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos.
texts.en: Virginia is 32 years old, and is a very happy and hard-working woman. She lives in her own home along with her 35 year old husband John and her dear daughter 12 year old Magali. What she most wishes is to provide a better quality of life, for which she is ready to work very hard. Every day early in the morning Virginia and her husband leave to work on their land. For them there is not a day of rest as they have to continually work their farm in order to have a good harvest and provide the best for their daughter. Their primary products they grown are cacao, coffee, banana, which they sell wholesale in San Francisco city. What she most likes about her work is the freedom that she has working with the crops, as she can freely enjoy her green fields. She has been doing this for more than 10 years and she considers the most difficult part to be taking care of the crops from the infestations than can affect them. In the future she plans on buying more land with which she can increase her crops. This is the fifth loan with MFP; she has been very punctual with her payments and she hopes to continue to do so. In her communal bank she is a cherished member by the rest of her colleagues. With the 1000 nuevos soles she is seeking, she will buy more coffee seeds to then harvest and reap the benefits of her labors.

loans.use: to buy coffee seeds

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
El Sr. Pablo tiene 59 años, está casado con la Sra. Mirian con quien tienen dos hijos: un varón ya mayor quien también tiene su propia familia y una hija que está estudiando en el colegio, en la secundaria.
Pablo se dedica a la chapería, empezó a trabajar en esta profesión desde muy pequeño como ayudante de un tio y luego de aprender el oficio se independizó y empezó a comprar de a poco sus herramientas, ya luego sus maquinarias para el doblado de las chapas.
Su señora le ayuda a levantar los pedidos y ofrecer sus productos en algunos casos cuando no tiene trabajo, porque en la mayoria de las veces ya trabaja con Arquitectos e Ingenieros de Obras.
Ellos actualmente están alquilando una casa en la Ciudad de San Lorenzo, donde viven y trabajan, pero gracias a las ganancias que tienen están construyendo una casa en otra ciudad a 45 Km de Caacupe.
El solicita el préstamo para poder comprar chapas galvanizadas y estaños.
texts.en:
Pablo is 59 years old and has two children with his wife, Mirian. His son is grown and has his own family now and his daughter is currently in secondary school.

Pablo is a metalworker; he began in this profession when he was very young, as an assistant to his uncle. He later trained in metalworking and started his own business, buying the tools he needed over time to work with metal sheeting. His wife helps him pick up orders and sell his products when she doesn't have work. Usually, Pablo works with architects or civil engineers.

Currently, Pablo and his family are renting a house in San Lorenzo city, where they live and work, but thanks to their business income they are building a house in another city 45 km from Caacupe. Pablo is requesting a loan to buy galvanized tin sheets.

loans.use: To purchase galvanized tin sheets.

loans.name: Milagros De Mozoquilpan Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama “MILÁGROS DE MOZOQUILPAN”,  está ubicado en el Estado de México, El grupo está conformado por 9 clientas, en este grupo se encuentra la señora Berenice P. M., es la presidenta del grupo.  Tiene de 28 años de edad, estudió hasta 3er grado de secundaria, su ocupación es comerciante de tortillas, servilletas y manteles, y tiene en total 2 hijos: 1 mujer y 1 varón, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, solicitó su préstamo para comprar maíz para la elaboración de tortillas.Nos platica que su negocio cada día va mejorando ya que cuenta con más clientes, se siente muy entusiasmada por la compra de material para la elaboración de más producto que le han solicitado sus clientas y que por falta de recursos no ha podido surtir y de sus ganancias poder abastecer lo indispensable para el sustento de su familia y la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
This group is called “Miracles of Mozoquilpan” and is based in the State of Mexico. The group is made up of 9 members, including Berenice P. M., the group’s president. She is 28 years old, has completed 3 years of secondary school and makes a living selling tortillas, napkins and tablecloths. She has 2 children: 1 girl and 1 boy.
She requested this loan to buy corn for making tortillas. She tells us that her business improves every day as her customer base grows. She is very excited about purchasing supplies to increase production and meet customer demand, which, for lack of resources, she has been unable to meet. She is also happy about the profits that will allow her to provide for her family and her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase corn to make tortillas

loans.name: Porvenir Group

texts.es:
Éste banco comunal se llama “Porvenir” y está conformado por 20 emprendedores, pertenecientes a la ciudad de San Antonio. Todos ellos se dedican a los rubros del comercio, vendiendo comida rápida, joyas, productos de amasandería, confites, bebidas y almuerzos en los colegios, además de desayunos en la feria.  
María es la presidenta del banco comunal y en la foto se encuentra en la primera fila señalada por las demás socias, ella viste una blusa floreada color celeste, pantalón negro y usa una cartera color café. Además su cabello es de color rubio.
Ella se dedica a vender artículos de aseo y herramientas de trabajo, en la feria desde hace 10 años. Su horario laboral son todos los días sábados en la mañana. Además, ofrece sus productos a sus vecinos y conocidos. Su mercadería la compra principalmente en distribuidoras de artículos de aseo y las herramientas las compra en casas de remate, además le van a ofrecer mercadería a su propio domicilio. 
Con el préstamo María comprará artículos de aseo y mantas de polar con diferentes estampados, para vender en la feria.
Sus metas en su negocio, son tener un local establecido donde pueda ofrecer y vender sus artículos de aseo, además de incorporar artículos de perfumería.
Sus sueños a nivel personal son concretar las metas de su negocio, de ésta manera obtendría mayores ganancias y una vida más confortable y menos sacrificada. María vive junto a su esposo y anhelan algún día viajar dentro del país para descansar.
María está contenta y agradecida del apoyo que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza, ya que disfruta de las reuniones, capacitaciones y facilidades de pago del crédito. Respecto a las capacitaciones, ella ha podido integrar los aprendizajes de contabilidad a su propio negocio. 
San Antonio es un puerto de la región de Valparaíso, siendo esta una de sus principales características, ubicado en el litoral central de Chile. Se desarrolla en forma importante la pesca y venta de pescados y mariscos. Pese a la actividad portuaria y comercial del puerto, existe un alto índice de cesantía.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Porvenir” ["Future"] and it is made up of 20 entrepreneurs who are residents of the city of San Antonio. All of them work in various sales businesses, selling fast food, jewelry, bakery products, sweets, soft drinks and school lunches, as well as breakfasts at an open-air market. 

María is the president of the communal bank, and in the photo she is in the first row, with the other members pointing at her. She is in a sky-blue flowered blouse with black pants and carries a brown purse. She also has blond hair. 

For the past 10 years, she has worked selling cleaning products and work tools at the open-air market. She works there every Saturday morning. She also offers her products to her neighbors and acquaintances. She buys most of her merchandise from cleaning product distributors, and she buys the tools from auction houses; in addition, some vendors come to her house to offer their merchandise. 
 
With the loan, María will buy cleaning products as well as fleece blankets decorated with various designs to sell at the market. 

Her goals for her business are to have an established store where she can display and sell her cleaning products, and also to begin selling perfumes. Her dreams on a personal level are to achieve her business goals so that she can obtain higher profits and have a more comfortable life with less sacrifice. María lives together with her husband and hopes someday to travel within the country as a vacation. 

María is happy and grateful for the support provided to her by the Fondo Esperanza ["Hope Fund"], since she enjoys the meetings, training sessions and payment arrangements for the loans. With regard to the training, she has been able to apply the accounting principles she has learned to her own business. 

San Antonio is well-known as a port in the Valparaíso region on Chile's central coast. It is an important center for fishing and the sale of fish and shellfish. In spite of the activity and commerce of the port, there is a high unemployment rate.

loans.use: to buy cleaning products as well as fleece blankets decorated with various designs

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
La Sra. Manuela está casada pero actualmente su marido no participa del crédito porque está trabajando en un restaurante en la Ciudad D. Asunción y no le dan permiso para firmar los documentos con ella.
El copetín lo habilitaron en el año 1997 con la experiencia del esposo que es cocinero D. profesión, al principio solo tenían una despensa y luego fueron complementando los fines D. semana con la venta D. pollo al espiedo, y como tenían éxito fueron agregando a su menú más variantes del mismo para luego incorporarle la venta D. bebidas para todos los gustos.
Su local comercial está en su propia vivienda ya que está ubicado sobre  una calle principal D. su barrio, en la Ciudad D. San Lorenzo.
En el negocio trabajan con dos D. sus hijas, quienes están estudiando en el colegio, nivel secundario.
Ella desea el crédito para poder comprar más bebidas y comestibles, que puedan abastecer D. mejor manera su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora Manuela is married but her husband is not joining her on this loan because he is working at a restaurant in the city of Asunción and has not been able to get time off from work to sign the documents with her. 

They outfitted the snack bar in 1997 with the experience of the husband who is a cook by profession. At first they had only a pantry and later they began augmenting on the weekends by selling rotisserie chicken. Since they were successful they continued to add to their menu more variations of the same, then incorporating drinks into the menu to please all manner of tastes. 

Their business establishment is located within their own living quarters as they are located on one of the primary roads in their neighborhood in the City of San Lorenzo. 

They work at their business with two of their daughters who are in school at the high school level. 

She wants the loan to be able to purchase more drinks and food items in order to better supply her business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of drinks: beer, soft drinks, wines etc., along with bakery items, meat, sugar and other food items.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge Luis tiene 42 años, este es el primer financiamiento que el realiza, por lo que ha sido una gran experiencia. El se dedica a brindar servicio en un bar y comedor. Por lo que todos los días sabe que tiene que levantarse temprano y comprar los diferentes productos que son necesarios para la elaboración de los platillos que ofrece.  A pesar de ser un negocio agotador y cansado sabe que tiene que seguir luchando para sus 3 hijos, el es un buen Padre  desea que sus hijos puedan estudiar y ser personas de bien. Actualmente el solicita un financiamiento que le ayude para la compra grano básicos, verduras, frutas, utensilios de cocina entre otros.
texts.en: Jorge Luis is 42 years old.  This is his first loan and he has had a good experience with the process.  He works at his bar and restaurant and every day must get up early to buy the different products he needs to prepare the foods he offers.  Even though it is a very tiring business, he knows he must keep fighting for his three children.  He is a good father and desires that his children can study and be successful.  He is currently asking for a loan to buy basic grains, vegetables, fruits, kitchen utensils, and other items.

loans.use: To buy grains, vegetables, fruits, kitchen utensils, etc.

loans.name: Kelly

texts.en:
Kelly is a member of the “Bienestar II” (Well Being) communal bank at FINCA Peru. She is 23 and in a live-in relationship. She bakes bread in her home and then sells it at a stall in a local market in Ayacucho. She will be using her loan of 600 PEN to buy ingredients such as flour, sugar, lard, and yeast to bake her bread. 

Kelly enjoys working with FINCA Peru because they enable easy access to loans as well as business support, and she can save money. She would like to improve the bakery in her home.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to bake bread

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa tiene 48 años; vive hace 30 años en concubinato con Mario. Ambos tienen 5 hijos de los cuales solo vive con una de ellos, en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Huanchan. Desde hace 28 años, está trabajadora mujer comenzó a dedicarse a la agricultura. Sus principales sembríos constan de papa, arveja, maíz y habas, los cuales siembra en sus 18 hectáreas de terreno agrícola. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder comercializar su producción en el mercado mayorista de su localidad, ya que ve el resultado de su trabajo. Asimismo se dedica al cuidado de animales menores como vacas, cerdos y carneros, los cuales después de ensebarlos los vende a un mayor precio, ganando un promedio de S/. 150 soles por cada animal, “los animales machos son más caros”, afirma. Su principal dificultad es la falta de capital, pues no genera ganancias diarias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Unión huanchan”, y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde se siente agradecida por el apoyo constante de su banco comunal. Luisa, comenzará su próximo sembrío por ello invertirá el crédito en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de arveja, como también de semillas de papa de la variedad “andina”.
texts.en:
Luisa is 48 years old and has lived with her significant other, Mario, for 30 years. They have five children, only one of which lives with them in the farmhouse they own in Huanchan. Luisa has been farming for 28 years. Her main crops are potatoes, peas, maize, and beans, which she plants on her 18-hectare farm.

What Luisa most enjoys about her work is selling her harvest in the local markets so that she can see the results of her hard work. She also raises small livestock such as cows, pigs and rams. After raising the animals she sells them at a higher price, averaging about 150 PEN per animal and higher for male animals. 

Her greatest challenge is lack of working capital, since she can't rely on daily income. Luisa belongs to the “Unión Huanchan” community bank, and this is her third loan with MFP. She is grateful for the continuous support from her bank. It is the beginning of a new planting season and Luisa will invest this loan in two bags of seed to grow peas and an Andean variety of potato.

loans.use: To buy two bags of seed to grow peas and potatoes.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es: Lucila, de 23 años convive desde hace 4 años con Leonidas. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Salvador y Silvano; a los que cuidan con mucho amor y cariño en una casa alquilada ubicada en el caserío de Huanchan. El trabajo arduo y sacrificado de la agricultura, es su principal actividad económica. Desde hace 4 años viene sembrando en terrenos alquilados, como también con socias que comparten los gastos de la siembra. Sus principales cultivos constan de papa, maíz y arveja. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder ver crecer sus sembríos, pues trabaja arduamente para poder mantener sus cultivos sanos y saludables; y ello lo demuestra con la buena venta de sus sembríos en el mercado central de la ciudad de Tarma. Asimismo tiene una vaca a la que extrae la leche y elabora queso y tres toros, para el arado de la tierra, ganando así un dinero extra. “Vendo 15 quesos a la semana, obteniendo S/. 2 soles de ganancia por cada venta”, menciona. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Unión huanchan”, y este es el cuarto crédito que tiene con MFP, donde se siente realizada pues recibe el apoyo constante de sus compañeros. Lucila, invertirá el crédito en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgánico que esparcirá en sus sembríos de papa.
texts.en:
Lucila is 23 years old and has lived with her partner, Leonidas, for four years.  They have two children, Salvador and Silvano, whom they love and care for in a rented house in the Huanchan rural area.  The arduous and demanding work of agriculture is her main source of income.  For four years she has been growing crops on rented farmland and sharing planting costs with business partners.  Her main crops are potatoes, corn and peas.

What she enjoys most about her work is seeing the crops grow since she works hard to keep them in good condition in a healthy environment.  This can be seen by the successful sales her crops have in the central market of the city of Tarma.  She also has a dairy cow, and makes cheese, and three oxen to plough the earth, so she can make a little extra money.  

"I sell 15 cheeses a week, and make S/. 2 (PEN) of profit on each sale.", she says.  She belongs to the "Unión Huanchan" communal bank and this is her fourth loan through MFP, where she feels good about the constant support she receives from her colleagues.  Lucila plans to use the loan to buy several sacks of organic fertilizer to put on her potato crop.

loans.use: To buy several sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: San Benito Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal San Benito esta en el sexto ciclo en FINCA Perú. Los miembros se dedican a vender aguas gaseosas, abarrotes, tienen recreos, y venD. comidas preparadas. 
Silvia, es L. presidenta del Banco. ElL. tiene 43 años y es casada con 4 hijos D. (27,23,21,11 D. edad).
Tiene un restaurante.
Solicita un crédito D. S/. 2500.00 Nuevos Soles.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en L. compra D. abarrotes como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite, verduras, carnes, entre otros para L. preparación D. alimentos.
Silvia tiene un restaurante en L. Av. Del Ejercito. AtienD. todos los días desayuno, almuerzo y cena. Tambien da pensión, extras y compromisos.
Está en FINCA Perú hace 6 ciclos, le gusta por L. facilidad en los créditos y pueD. ahorrar. Con sus ahorros compró puertas y ventanas para su casa e implementó su negocio.         
Está ahorrando para poder comprarse un exhibidor para mostrar sus tortas, gelatinas y helados. Su sueño es que sus hijos sean profesionales y que siga prosperando su negocio.
texts.en:
The "San Benito" communal bank is in its sixth term with FINCA Perú.  The members sell sodas, groceries, prepared meals and recreation services.

Silvia is the president of the bank.  She is 43 years old and has 4 children (ages 27, 23, 21 and 11).  She runs a restaurant and is requesting a loan in the amount of 2,500 PEN which she plans to use to buy groceries such as rice, sugar, pasta, oil, vegetables, meat and other food items to prepare meals.

Her restaurant is located in "Ejército" Avenue where she serves breakfast, lunch and dinner.  She also has a catering service.  This is her sixth loan through FINCA Perú and she likes it because of the good credit terms and the fact that she can save money.  With her savings she was able to buy doors and windows for her house and start her business.  She is saving to buy a display case to exhibit her cakes, gelatins and ice creams.  Her dreams is that her children become professionals and that her business be more and more successful.

loans.use: To buy groceries such as rice, sugar, pasta, oil, vegetables, meat and other food items

loans.name: Miler

texts.es: Miler tiene 41 años; convive desde hace 18 años con Eva. Ambos tienen 3 hijos menores a los que cuida en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Huanchan. El carisma que irradia es producto de su trabajo. Su vida se centra en el cuidado de sus cultivos de papa y arveja, los cuales siembra desde hace 11 años. Lo que más de gusta de su trabajo es poder invertir el dinero ganado en el bienestar de los suyos. El trabajo constante, es su principal característica. Ya que también se dedica a la ganadería; con las 6 vacas lecheras realiza queso; los cuales vende a los intermediarios que comercializan en el producto lácteo a los diferentes mercados de abastos. Aparte de ello en épocas de campaña agrícola, trabaja en el trasporte de papaya a la ciudad de Pucallpa, donde le pagan por el traslado de la fruta.  Su principal dificultad es la falta de capital de trabajo pues necesita un soporte económico para los gastos familiares. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Unión huanchan”, y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollado, pues encuentra una oportunidad de lograr sus objetivos. Miler, invertirá el crédito en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja, asimismo de varios sacos de abono orgánico, los cuales esparcirá en sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en:
Miler is 41 years old and has lived with his partner, Eva, for 18 years.  They have three minor children who live with them in their own home in the Huanchan rural area.  His charisma is a result of his work since his life has centered on caring for his potato and pea crops.  He has been growing brops since he was 11 years old.  What he likes best about his work is being able to spend the money he earns on his loved ones.   His main characteristic is that he is constantly working and also raises livestock.  He has 6 dairy cows and makes cheese which he sells to merchants who sell dairy products to the many wholesale markets.

Apart from this, during harvest season he also transports papaya fruit to the city of Pucallpa where he is paid for the transportation.  His main difficulty is the lack of working capital since he has to cover household expenses.

He belongs to the "Unión Huanchan" communal bank and this is his fourth loan through MFP, where he feels he has been able to develop and have the opportunity to reach his goals.  Miler plans to use the loan to buy bags of pea seeds and several sacks of organic fertilizer for his potato crop.

loans.use: To buy pea seeds and sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Miriam Elizabeth

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Ilusiones, esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad. Se la conoce como el sector de la cárcel ya que en esta zona queda la cárcel de mujeres de Portoviejo.

La señora Miriam es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son más bajos que en otras instituciones de crédito y por la oportunidad de continuar con su negocio. Tiene  38 años de edad, es madre soltera de una hija de 13 años la misma que estudian en colegio, vive en casa de la mamá.

Además de ser una muy buena madre, también se dedica al comercio, vende productos por catalogo como ropa, artículos plásticos y para el hogar, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, trabaja todos los días por las mañanas, lleva varios años dedicada a esta actividad y le ha ido muy bien. También realiza trabajos de belleza y arreglo personal, sus trabajos  los realiza tanto en su casa como a domicilio, nos cuenta que cuando realiza sus trabajos también ofrece sus productos.

Este crédito es para comprar productos plásticos, artículos para el hogar y ropa ya que tiene varios pedidos.

Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
In the neighborhood of El Progreso in the city of Portoviejo, the communal bank ILUSIONES meets every two weeks.  This is a marginal urban area of the city which is densley populated.  It is known as the jail sector since the Portoviejo women's prison is located here.

Mrs. Miriam is a founding member of the communal bank which she enjoys because of the low interest rates it gives compared to other loan institutions and because it allows her to continue her business.  She is 38 years old, a single mother and has a 13-year-old daughter who is in school.  They live with Miriam's mother.

In addition to being a good mother, she also is a merchant and sells products by catalogue such as clothing, plastic articles and household items.  She sells on a door-to-door basis and works every day in the mornings.  She has been involved in this activity for several years and so far it has been successful.  She also has a beauty and personal care service which she provides in her home or door-to-door.  When doing this she offers her other products for sale.

She plans to use the loan to buy plastic products, houshold articles and clothing for which she has already taken orders.

Her dream is to have her own house one day.

loans.use: To buy plastic products, household items and clothing

loans.name: Felipe Israel

texts.es:
El señor Felipe Israel tiene ya mas de diez y siete años dedicándose a  su taller de soldadura, realiza figuras y protecciones de fiero y aluminio. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder comprar una maquina más grande para soldar y material para realizar los pedidos que tiene pendientes. Ya que en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la inversión, y no quiere descapitalizar el negocio ya que es la fuente de ingreso del su familia. 
Planea pagar el crédito con las ganancias que obtendrá  ya teniendo su maquina nueva y podrá entregar los pedidos que tiene pendiente a tiempo.
texts.en:
Mr. Felipe Israel has been running a welding workshop for over 17 years.  He makes iron and aluminum railings and gates.  He is requesting a loan to buy larger welding equipment and material to be able to fill the orders he has already taken. 

He does not have the necessary funds for the investment right now because he cannot decapitalize the business as it is his family's only source of income.  He plans to pay back the loan with the profits he will make once he has his new machine and is able to deliver the goods he has on back-order.

loans.use: To buy new welding machinery

loans.name: La Union De Mujeres Group

texts.es: ESTE GRUPO SE LLAMA UNION DE MUJERES, ESTA UBICADO EN EL ESTADO DE MEXICO. EL GRUPO ESTA CONFORMADO POR NUEVE INTEGRANTES Y ES LA PRIMERA VEZ QUE SOLICITAN UN PRESTAMO. MARIA DE JESUS M. H. ES UNA DE LAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO, TIENE 45 AÑOS, ESTUDIO HASTA SEGUNDO AÑO DE PRIMARIA, ES CASADA Y TIENE UN TOTAL DE 5 HIJOS (4 VARONES Y 1 MUJER). ELLA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE VERDURAS EL CUAL INICIO HACE MAS DE 7 AÑOS. SOLICITA EL PRESTAMO PARA COMPRAR SEMILLAS DE VERDURAS YA QUE ELLA MISMA SE DEDICA A CULTIVAR LAS VERDURAS QUE VENDE. LA SEÑORA COMENTA QUE SUS CLIENTES HAN QUEDADO SATISFECHOS CON EL SERVICIO QUE OFRECE, ADEMAS DE QUE SUS PRODUCTOS SON DE BUENA CALIDAD. AL MOMENTO DE SOLICITAR EL PRESTAMO SE SIENTE FELIZ PORQUE ASI PODRA CONTINUAR CON SUS INVERSIONES Y PRODUCCION DE VERDURAS. TAMBIEN ESPERA QUE A CORTO PLAZO PUEDA INVERTIR EN LA GANADERIA Y PODER SEGUIR APOYANDO A SUS HIJOS PARA QUE TERMINEN SUS ESTUDIOS. YA QUE DE ESA MANERA ELLA VE REFLEJADO EL FRUTO DE SU TRABAJO.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Unión de Mujeres' (Women's Union) and it is located in the State of Mexico.  The group has nine members and this is the first time that they have requested a loan.

Maria de Jesus M. H. is one of the members of this group.  She is 45 years old and studied up to the second year of her primary education.  She is married and has five children (four boys and one girl).  She has been selling vegetables for more than seven years.  Maria is requesting this loan to buy vegetable seeds since she grows the vegetables that she sells herself.  She tells us that her customers have been satisfied with the service that she offers and her produce is good quality.  At the time of requesting her loan, Maria feels happy because she will be able to continue with her investments and continue producing vegetables.  She also hopes that, in the short term, she will be able to invest in livestock and continue supporting her children so that they finish their studies.  In this way, she will see her work rewarded.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds

loans.name: Aurora Elizabeth

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Ilusiones, esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada de esta ciudad. Se la conoce como el sector de la cárcel ya que en esta zona queda la cárcel de mujeres de Portoviejo.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Aurora, ella tiene 23 años de edad,  está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 5 y 2 años, el mayor este año empieza sus estudios en la escuela. El esposo trabaja en una vulcanizadora.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes, nos cuenta que tiene muchos clientes que le  hacen los pedidos con anticipación. Trabaja cuatro días de la semana en la entrega y cobros de sus productos, ya que deja a crédito y cobra por quincena. Su mercadería la compra en Guayaquil cada quince, lleva 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le ha ido bastante bien.

Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, blusas, camisetas entre otras cosas que le han pedido para esta quincena. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos a salido adelante con su negocio y en su vida personal.
 
Su sueño es tener una gran local.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the Ilusiones community bank meets in El Progreso neighborhood, in the city of Portoviejo.  This is a very densely-populated, poor, urban area of the city.  It is known as 'the prison sector' as Portoviejo Women's Prison is located in this area.

Here we meet 23 year-old Aurora who is married and has two children aged 5 and 2.  Her eldest is starting school this year.  Her husband works in a tire repair shop.

Aurora sells all kinds of clothes.  She makes her sales door to door and also from her home as some customers come to her.  She tells us that she has a lot of customers who make orders with her in advance.  Aurora works four days a week delivering her products and collecting payment since she leaves her products with her customers on credit and collects payment every two weeks.  She buys her merchandise in Guayaquil every two weeks.  She has been in this business for four years and it has done quite well.

Aurora will use this loan to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts and other products that her customers have ordered this fortnight.  She has been a member of her community bank since it was founded and she likes it because, thanks to the loans, she has made progress in both her business and her personal life.

Aurora's dream is to own a large store.

loans.use: to buy blouses, t-shirts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Jeniffer Estefania

texts.es:
